translated: Having recited the essence mantra of binding the consort, one binds her.

original: 'di nyid gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsungs pa ni /
translated: This is stated:

original: snying gar rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag ste /🔽sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: snying gar rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag ste / sa ma ya stvam /
translated: Having placed the form of the vajra at the heart,

original: zhes brjod nas /
analyzed: zhes brjod nas /
translated: one should say, “Samaya stvam.”

original: bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni /
analyzed: bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni /
translated: Having accomplished the recitation one hundred thousand times,

original: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: one will obtain all powers.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what it teaches.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa pos bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa pos bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: The practitioner who wishes to accomplish the pledge seal should perform the self-consecration, and so forth.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje snying gar bsams la /
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje snying gar bsams la /
translated: Having visualized the sattva-vajra at the heart,

original: sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam /
translated: one should say, “Samaya stvam.”

original: zhes brjod la rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod la rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind the pledge seal of one’s deity.

original: de nas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
translated: Then, for about one month, one should bind the seal and do immeasurable recitation of the mantra of one’s deity.

original: de nas yang de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas la mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas yang de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas la mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having recited in the same way, at the end, on the full moon, if one recites throughout the night, by that one will attain the power of all pledge seals.

original: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs nas /🔽da ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs nas / da ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: Having thus taught the accomplishment of the pledge seals,🔽now, the accomplishment of all action seals is taught.

original: de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The tantra that accomplishes all action seals is called

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “then” as before.

original: las kyi phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na las kyi phyag rgya thams cad do //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na las kyi phyag rgya thams cad do //
translated: Since it is an action seal and also all, it is all action seals.

original: de rnams kyi bsgrub pa ni bdud bcom pa la sogs ba sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsgrub pa ni bdud bcom pa la sogs ba sgrub pa'o //
translated: Their accomplishment is the accomplishment of conquering the demons and so forth.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
translated: The collection of words that teaches that is a tantra.

original: bdud las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i las kyi @274b phyag rgya bcings la bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdud las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i las kyi @274b phyag rgya bcings la bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar bya'o //
translated: The line victorious over the demons means that one should bind the action seal of Akshobhya and be victorious over the hosts of demons.

original: mchog rtogs shing zhes bya ba ni mchog ni dam pa ste /
analyzed: mchog rtogs shing zhes bya ba ni mchog ni dam pa ste /
translated: The line realizing the supreme means that the supreme is the highest.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: It is unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de rtogs pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de rtogs pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: Realizing that is full awakening.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The line turning the wheel of Dharma means

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas chos ston pa'o //🔽mtshungs med sems dang don byas nas //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas chos ston pa'o // mtshungs med sems dang don byas nas //
translated: that one should bind the action seal of Amitabha and teach the Dharma.

original: zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: The line having acted for the sake of incomparable beings means that one should bind the action seal of Amoghasiddhi🔽and think in one's mind, I will act for the sake of those sentient beings who engage in perverse conduct.

original: log par spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bya bar yid la bsams par byas na'ang de lta bus cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: log par spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bya bar yid la bsams par byas na'ang de lta bus cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one asks, What will come of that?

original: las kyi phyag rgya grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya grub par 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: the line one will achieve the action seal is stated.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
translated: Having performed the self-consecration, and so on, one should visualize a variegated vajra at one's heart from the letter A.

original: badzras tva / zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la bdud rab tu gzhom par bya'o //
analyzed: badzras tva / zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la bdud rab tu gzhom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting vajrasattva, one should bind the action seal of Akshobhya and conquer the demons.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, binding the action seal of Vairochana, reciting om bhuh kham, one should imagine oneself fully enlightened through the stages of the five manifest enlightenments.

original: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu chen pos bdag nyid la dbang bskur la /
analyzed: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu chen pos bdag nyid la dbang bskur la /
translated: Reciting vajra ratna, one should confer empowerment upon oneself with the great jewel of the nature of the jewel clan.

original: badzra dharm'a zhes zlos shing 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra dharm'a zhes zlos shing 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting vajra dharma, one should turn the wheel of the doctrine by binding the action seal of Amitabha.

original: de nas badzra karma zhes zlos shing don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas badzra karma zhes zlos shing don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, reciting “vajra karma,” one should form the karma-mudra of Amoghasiddhi.

original: sems can log par spyod pa dang / yongs su dga' ba rnams dbang du bsdus shing do byas nas bdag nyid bya ba byas pa lta bur bsams la /
analyzed: sems can log par spyod pa dang / yongs su dga' ba rnams dbang du bsdus shing do byas nas bdag nyid bya ba byas pa lta bur bsams la /
translated: Having brought under one’s control and employed sentient beings who are perversely disposed and those who are delighted, one should imagine that one has done one’s duty.

original: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Having formed the deity’s mudra,

original: snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
translated: one should perform the recitation as before for one month.

original: de'i rjes la zla ba gnyis pa la yang mthar zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la zla ba gnyis pa la yang mthar zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te /
translated: Then, in the second month, one should also perform the recitation throughout the night on the full moon.

original: de lta bus ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one will attain the power of all the karma-mudras.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mchog ni las kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mchog ni las kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: The supreme power of all the Tathagatas is the accomplishment of the karma-mudra, etc.

original: de'i cho ga ni bya ba rnams so //🔽de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni chos @275a * //
analyzed: de'i cho ga ni bya ba rnams so // de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni chos @275a * //
translated: Its rite is the performance of the duties.

original: kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'i rgyun no //
analyzed: kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'i rgyun no //
translated: Its extensive rite is the performance of the dharma-mudra, etc.

original: de ston par byed pa sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
translated: The collection of words that teach that is a tantra.

original: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
translated: The extensive rite for the initiation of the disciple, etc. is complete.

original: // / yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, its meaning should be stated.

original: yang bdag bsrung ba dang / bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas la bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir spos chab kyis bkang ba'i snod la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
analyzed: yang bdag bsrung ba dang / bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas la bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir spos chab kyis bkang ba'i snod la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
translated: Having performed the protection of oneself, the destruction of obstructors, etc., in order to perform the sprinkling, fill a vessel with perfumed water, and recite the Vajrayakṣa mantra over it.

original: lha'i khang pa'i sgor bzhag la /
analyzed: lha'i khang pa'i sgor bzhag la /
translated: Place it at the door of the temple of the deity.

original: mchod yon dang mchod pa rnam pa lnga la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bzla'o //
analyzed: mchod yon dang mchod pa rnam pa lnga la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bzla'o //
translated: Recite the mantra over the water for welcoming and the five offerings as appropriate.

original: mchod chen thams cad dgug pa dang / bdag la byin rlabs la sogs bsgrub //
analyzed: mchod chen thams cad dgug pa dang / bdag la byin rlabs la sogs bsgrub //
translated: Summon all the great offerings, and accomplish the consecration of oneself, etc.

original: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chad zhing //
analyzed: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chad zhing //
translated: Always holding the vajra and bell,

original: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //🔽lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am /
analyzed: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya // lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am /
translated: one should accomplish the supreme attainment.🔽Whether cast, or carved,

original: byas pa'am ni bris pa yi //
analyzed: byas pa'am ni bris pa yi //
translated: or made, or drawn,

original: dang po'i 'khor lo bzhag nas ni //
analyzed: dang po'i 'khor lo bzhag nas ni //
translated: having placed the first wheel,

original: des ni slar yang rab tu 'grub //
analyzed: des ni slar yang rab tu 'grub //
translated: one will again be successful.

original: yi ge h'um ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya'o //
translated: With the letter hūṃ, the gesture of the vajra wheel, one should emanate the mandala of the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: de nas gal te 'bor pa yod na me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod la /
analyzed: de nas gal te 'bor pa yod na me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod la /
translated: Then, if there is a flower, one should worship the mandala with the flower, and so on.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
translated: Reciting “Oṃ, I pay homage to the vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas,”

original: zhes zlos shing phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag bzhi byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad cing /🔽sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes zlos shing phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag bzhi byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad cing / sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: one should make four prostrations in all directions to the mandala of the Blessed One Vairocana and his retinue, and one should perform all the rites and take up the vows.

original: de nas rdo rje thal mo dang / rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas rdo rje bsdams pa rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje thal mo dang / rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas rdo rje bsdams pa rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having made the vajra-folded-hand gesture and the vajra-binding gesture, one should open the vajra-binding gesture at one’s heart.

original: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed la /
translated: Then, having generated the vajra-descent,

original: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bas dbab pa brtan par byas la rdo rje khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bas dbab pa brtan par byas la rdo rje khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: With a vajra fist, one should form the pledge seal,

original: aom badzra mushta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra mushta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: and recite “oṃ vajra-muṣṭiṃ bandhāmi. ”

original: de nas phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa rnam par dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa rnam par dral bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should release the seal, and with the seal for loosening evil, one should loosen evil.

original: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la skyil mo krung gi steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la skyil mo krung gi steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te bzhag la /
translated: Then, one should sit in the vajra posture, and on top of the crossed legs, one should place the crossed vajra.

original: snying gar sems ma rdo rje bkod de /
analyzed: snying gar sems ma rdo rje bkod de /
translated: One should place the mind-vajra at the heart,

original: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs @275b pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs @275b pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and one should meditate on the stages of the five manifest enlightenments as taught in the Ārya-tattvasamgraha.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /🔽sa ma ya stvam ham /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la / sa ma ya stvam ham /
translated: Then, one should form the seal of the Blessed Vairocana,

original: zhes bsgoms la /
analyzed: zhes bsgoms la /
translated: and meditate on “samastvam ahaṃ. ”

original: sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
analyzed: sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
translated: Samaya satva adhisthāna svāṃ.

original: zhes bya ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang dpral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang dpral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: And with that very samaya mudra, one should bless the heart, forehead, throat, and head.

original: de nas rnam pa snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rnam pa snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should bind the great mudra of Vairocana.

original: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi snying gar yid kyis zhugs la /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi snying gar yid kyis zhugs la /
translated: Then, with the yoga of space, one should mentally enter one’s heart.

original: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par sprul la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par sprul la /
translated: With the vajra wheel mudra, one should emanate there the great maṇḍala of the blessed Vairocana.

original: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
translated: One should perform the entire rite of one’s own entrance up to the practice of the vajra conduct for spiritual powers.

original: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i nang du 'dres par bsams la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i nang du 'dres par bsams la /
translated: One should imagine that one has entered one’s heart, and that one has dissolved into the moon.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ;
translated: Binding the great mudra of the blessed Vairocana,

original: aom bhu kham aa zhes zlos shing mdun du sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
analyzed: aom bhu kham aa zhes zlos shing mdun du sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
translated: Reciting Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ āḥ, one should imagine a variegated lotus in front.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsams la /
translated: On that, one should imagine a vajra of the tathāgatas.

original: badzra h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje'i nga rgyal du bsgoms te /
analyzed: badzra h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje'i nga rgyal du bsgoms te /
translated: With vajra hūṃ, one should meditate on the pride of being a vajra.🔽With vairocana hūṃ, one should imagine oneself as Vairocana.

original: bee ro tsa na h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i snying po dang bcas pas dgug pa dang
analyzed: bee ro tsa na h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i snying po dang bcas pas dgug pa dang
translated: In that very place, one should summon the Blessed One Vairocana with the previously explained essence of the action seal of the vajra hook and so forth,

original: / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o //
translated: and one should induct him, bind him, and control him.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom bhu kham dri shya zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad blta bar byas la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom bhu kham dri shya zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad blta bar byas la /
translated: Then, with the samaya seal of the tathāgatas and Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ dṛśya, one should make Vairocana visible.

original: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i lcags kyu mas rang gi lus la bcug la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i lcags kyu mas rang gi lus la bcug la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
translated: With Om bhukham, and with the secret hook, one should enter one's own body, and bind the supreme body of all the tathagatas.

original: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas sa ma ya satvam dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas sa ma ya satvam dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: Having generated the mandala of light, one should say Samaya stvam, and Samaya stvam jham hum bam hoh,

original: aom bhu kham zhes lan gsum bzlas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes lan gsum bzlas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and Om bhukham three times, and think that the Bhagavat Vairocana and oneself become one, like water poured into water.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dang las dang / phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //🔽de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad @276a * //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dang las dang / phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad @276a * //
translated: Then, one should bind the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal of the Bhagavat.

original: pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Then, one should perform the great yoga as explained in the Vajradhatu Mahamandala.

original: snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes bdag la byin gyis brlab pa byas nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes bdag la byin gyis brlab pa byas nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la /
translated: Having performed the self-consecration with the first vajra as before, one should stabilize it with the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
translated: One should confer empowerment with the mudra of conferring the precious empowerment.

original: yi ge gnyis kyis go cha bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis kyis go cha bgo bar bya'o //
translated: One should don the armor with the two syllables.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
translated: Then, having taken the empowerment of the tathagata vajra, the lord, and the name empowerment,

original: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs gzung bar bya'o //
translated: one should take up the vajra observances of spiritual powers.

original: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Then, having made offerings with the twelve offerings of the mudras, such as the vajra of passion,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen pos bcings la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen pos bcings la /
translated: one should bind the great mudra of Bhagavat Vairochana.

original: de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung ste /
translated: Holding the vajra with reality,

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: one should ring the dharma bell and bless the great pledge mudra.

original: aom bhu kham zhes lan gsum bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes lan gsum bzla bar bya'o //
translated: One should recite “Oṃ bhu khaṃ” three times.

original: de nas dang po'i rdo rje nam mkha'i phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa'i gzhal yas khang de bzhin du bskyed de /
analyzed: de nas dang po'i rdo rje nam mkha'i phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa'i gzhal yas khang de bzhin du bskyed de /
translated: Then, in the space direction, one should generate the celestial mansion of Vajrasattva with the first vajra.

original: lha thams cad kyi gnas su hri las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bsams la /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi gnas su hri las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bsams la /
translated: Having visualized a multicolored lotus seat from hriḥ in the location of all the deities,

original: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //🔽de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: one should meditate on oneself as Vajrasattva in the manner of the maṇḍala of the goddess. This is the first samādhi, the preliminary union.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, beginning with “The teacher Vajradhara,”🔽up to

original: byang chub snying por byin rlob mdzod //
analyzed: byang chub snying por byin rlob mdzod //
translated: “consecrate the site of enlightenment,”

original: ces bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pa bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pa bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
translated: the meditation on the explanation is the second samādhi, called the supreme king of maṇḍalas.

original: de nas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having opened the door, one should gather.

original: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya ba ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya ba ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o //
translated: Then, the performance of all the rites explained in the Vajradhātu Mahāmaṇḍala is the third samādhi, called the supreme king of activities.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms nas yang bsdu bar byas la /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms nas yang bsdu bar byas la /
translated: Having thus meditated on the three samādhis, one should gather them again.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
translated: Meditate on the great seal of Bhagavat Vairocana.🔽Praise with the one hundred and eight names beginning with:

original: dpal mchog dang po'i sems dpa' che //
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i sems dpa' che //
translated: The glorious Supreme One, the great being,

original: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
translated: The great joy, the great delight,

original: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
analyzed: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
translated: The all-good, the nature of all,

original: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag //🔽ces bya ba la sogs pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag // ces bya ba la sogs pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
translated: The lord of the vajra-arrogance, the lord of the self.🔽Reciting Oṃ akaro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ādyanutpannatva,

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a nam a'a dya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces zlos shing gsang @276b ba'i lcags kyu mas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a nam a'a dya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces zlos shing gsang @276b ba'i lcags kyu mas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
translated: invite the maṇḍala of the Bhagavat with the retinue with the secret hook.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas chos dang / las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas chos dang / las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having meditated on the pledge seal as before, seal with the Dharma, action, and great seals.

original: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur la rdo rje sems ma nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar du sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur nas mchod yon phul te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur la rdo rje sems ma nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar du sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur nas mchod yon phul te /
translated: Then, with the gesture of the vajra jewel, one should confer initiation on the tathāgatas, and confer the initiation of the five buddhas’ diadems on Vajrasattva and so forth up to Vajraghaṇṭā, and offer a welcome offering.

original: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should perfectly worship the Lord Vairocana together with his retinue with the five offerings and the twelve offerings of the gestures.

original: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
analyzed: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
translated: Then, having bowed with the joy of the dance of Vajra,

original: phyag bzhi byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: phyag bzhi byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: having made four prostrations, one should bind the great pledge seal of the Lord Vairocana.🔽Reciting the three heart-mantras,

original: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /🔽aom sva bh'a ba shuddho & ham /
analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham / aom sva bh'a ba shuddho & ham /
translated: “Oṃ vajra ātmāko ’haṃ🔽Oṃ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ

original: aom sarba sa mo& ham /🔽zhes bya ba'i snying po gsum zlos shing /
analyzed: aom sarba sa mo& ham / zhes bya ba'i snying po gsum zlos shing /
translated: Oṃ sarva samāśuddho ’haṃ,”

original: don gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: don gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: one should meditate on the three meanings.

original: ta th'a ga ta mandala sva bh'a wa ham sva mam /
analyzed: ta th'a ga ta mandala sva bh'a wa ham sva mam /
translated: Reciting tathagatamanadalasvabhavaatmako 'ham,

original: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid ni rang nyid de /
analyzed: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid ni rang nyid de /
translated: one should think, I myself

original: da bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo yin no zhes bsam mo //
analyzed: da bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo yin no zhes bsam mo //
translated: am the essence of the maṇḍala of the Tathāgatas.

original: de nas / kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
analyzed: de nas / kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
translated: Then, one should think, I am the supreme of all, the great attainment,

original: dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug che //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug che //
translated: the great lord, the great lord of lords,

original: bde ba chen po dngos grub mchog //
analyzed: bde ba chen po dngos grub mchog //
translated: the great bliss, the supreme attainment,🔽and may I become a Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs par bdag gyur cig / ces bsams la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs par bdag gyur cig / ces bsams la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
translated: In the center of the vajra located in one's heart,

original: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la 'di nyid chos kyi tshig gis zlos shing bdag nyid lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la 'di nyid chos kyi tshig gis zlos shing bdag nyid lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should mentally write oṃ bhakṣa and recite this very Dharma verse, contemplating oneself as the nature of all deities.

original: de ltar na dang por bdag la byin gyis brlab pa lan cig byas nas gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor bas gnas par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar na dang por bdag la byin gyis brlab pa lan cig byas nas gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor bas gnas par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: Thus, having first performed the self-consecration once, when one wishes to abide in equipoise,

original: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su rnam par bzhag la /
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su rnam par bzhag la /
translated: Reciting Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ, one should place it in the place of Vairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gis //
translated: With the supreme body of all the Tathāgatas,

original: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kyi gnas bzhir de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kyi gnas bzhir de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la gnas par bya'o //
translated: Reciting Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ, one should bless oneself in the four places in the same way and abide there.

original: bya ba thams cad byas nas yang slar zhugs te /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad byas nas yang slar zhugs te /
translated: Having performed all the activities, one should again enter.

original: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying pos rnam par snang mdzad rang gi lus la bcug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod @277a * //
analyzed: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying pos rnam par snang mdzad rang gi lus la bcug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod @277a * //
translated: With Guhyapāśā and the essence of Vairocana, one should cause Vairocana to enter one's own body and praise with the one hundred and eight names,

original: pa dang / mchod pa bcu gnyis dang / phyag kyang byas la de bzhin du bsgoms par bya'o //
analyzed: pa dang / mchod pa bcu gnyis dang / phyag kyang byas la de bzhin du bsgoms par bya'o //
translated: the twelve offerings, and also make prostrations, and meditate in the same way.

original: bsgom pas dub par gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa dang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin du phyag byas la de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pas dub par gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa dang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin du phyag byas la de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Having made prostrations in that way, one should request the Blessed One and his retinue to depart.

original: de ltar zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam //
analyzed: de ltar zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam //
translated: In this way, one should practice for one month, or six months,

original: lo gcig gam //
analyzed: lo gcig gam //
translated: or one year,

original: dus ji srid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba stsol ba de srid kyi bar du nyin re zhing bya'o //
analyzed: dus ji srid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba stsol ba de srid kyi bar du nyin re zhing bya'o //
translated: or for as long as the Blessed One grants permission.

original: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re 'am /
analyzed: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re 'am /
translated: Then, every day, or every month,

original: lo re zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: lo re zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: or every year, one should draw the maṇḍala.

original: de la dang por sa spyang ba dang / sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga rjes su spyad la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje 'khor los rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas sngom pa bzung la rnal 'byor chen po dang /
analyzed: de la dang por sa spyang ba dang / sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga rjes su spyad la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje 'khor los rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas sngom pa bzung la rnal 'byor chen po dang /
translated: First, having purified the ground and performed the rite of taking possession of the ground, having performed the subjugation of obstacles, and so forth, one should generate the mandala of Vairocana with the vajra wheel, and having made obeisance, one should take up the vow, and perform the great yoga.

original: gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed de /
translated: One should generate the celestial mansion and the seats.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
translated: Seated in the center of the mandala in the sattva posture,

original: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: one should generate enthusiasm as before.

original: de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ba byas la yang phyag byas nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang / las kyi rgyal mchog rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ba byas la yang phyag byas nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang / las kyi rgyal mchog rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: Then, having invited all the buddhas in the same way, and having made obeisance, one should visualize the first union, the supreme king of mandalas, and the supreme king of actions.

original: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: For the sake of drawing the mandala,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
translated: all tathāgatas

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po //
translated: The great family of the Tathagata

original: sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol //
translated: is the supreme of all buddhas.

original: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam mo //
analyzed: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam mo //
translated: Please explain it.🔽Then, with the pledge seal of Vairochana, recite Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ vajra-tīkṣṇa-maṇḍala utthāpaya.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom bhu kham badzra tishtha mandala auttha pa ya zhes zlos shing yid kyis dkyil 'khor bteg la nam mkhar gzhag ste /
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / aom bhu kham badzra tishtha mandala auttha pa ya zhes zlos shing yid kyis dkyil 'khor bteg la nam mkhar gzhag ste /
translated: With that, lift the mandala mentally, and place it in space.

original: aom bhu kham aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: aom bhu kham aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: With Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ adhi-tiṣṭha sva-maṃ, and with that very pledge seal, consecrate oneself at the heart, forehead, throat, and top of the head, and form the great seal of Bhagavat Vairochana.🔽With Vajra-dṛṣṭi-mat, place it at the two eyes.

original: badzra drishtha mata ces bya ba mig gnyis su dgod pa dang / phyag rgyal gnas de bzhin langs //
analyzed: badzra drishtha mata ces bya ba mig gnyis su dgod pa dang / phyag rgyal gnas de bzhin langs //
translated: The seal is placed in the same way.

original: kun du rnam @277b par bltas nas ni //
analyzed: kun du rnam @277b par bltas nas ni //
translated: Looking all around,

original: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing //
analyzed: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing //
translated: Reciting “Oṃ bhūḥ khaṃ,”

original: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
translated: one should circle it in a majestic manner.

original: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga byas nas nyi ma 'char kar dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga byas nas nyi ma 'char kar dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
translated: Then, having performed all the rites, having performed the rite of consecrating the disciples and consecrating the deity, one should lay out the maṇḍala at sunrise.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho gas thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho gas thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: The outer maṇḍala should be laid out with the rite of laying out the maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: de'i nang du phyed kyi tshad la rdo rje rtse gsum pa zlum por bskor ba /
analyzed: de'i nang du phyed kyi tshad la rdo rje rtse gsum pa zlum por bskor ba /
translated: In the center of that, with a size of half, one should lay out the maṇḍala of a three-pointed vajra surrounded by a circle,

original: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par bri ba'i thig gdab bo //
analyzed: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par bri ba'i thig gdab bo //
translated: beautified with eight pillars.

original: de nas tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: de nas tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Then, having drawn the maṇḍala with the five-colored chalk powder,

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig pa /
translated: in the center of the inner maṇḍala, on a variegated lotus, one should draw Bhagavān Vairocana, golden-colored, with one face,

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
translated: He holds a vajra of the Tathagata, sealed with the supreme enlightenment.

original: rdo rje skyil mi krung gis bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mi krung gis bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
translated: He sits in the vajra posture, with the radiance of the sun.

original: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: He is consecrated with a precious crown.

original: zhal shar du gzigs pa cung zad 'dzum pa su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddha mam zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhal shar du gzigs pa cung zad 'dzum pa su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddha mam zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
translated: Facing east, he is slightly smiling.

original: de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa zla ba'i mdog can sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /🔽rnal 'byor pa mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bsam zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po badzra satva h'um /
analyzed: de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa zla ba'i mdog can sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba / rnal 'byor pa mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bsam zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po badzra satva h'um /
translated: In front of him, in the place of Rāgavajrā, is the Blessed One Akṣobhya, the color of the moon, sitting in the earth-touching gesture, consecrated with a crown of vajra jewels.🔽The yogin, with the pride of Akṣobhya, imagines that he has conquered the demons.

original: zhes zlos shing bri par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes zlos shing bri par bya'o //
translated: Reciting the essence of Vajrasattva, vajra-sattva-hūṃ, he should draw.

original: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan bee d'u rya'i mdog can /
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan bee d'u rya'i mdog can /
translated: In the place of Kali Kali, the Bhagavat Ratnasaṃbhava, the color of vaiḍūrya,

original: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: is seated in the mudra of supreme giving, and is consecrated with a precious diadem.

original: rnal 'byor pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor chen pos bdag la dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor chen pos bdag la dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
translated: The yogin, with the pride of Ratnasaṃbhava, imagines that he is consecrated with the great wealth of the bodhisattvas.

original: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting “vajra ratna,” he should draw it.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: Behind the Bhagavat Vairocana, in the place of Vajrasmrti, the Bhagavat Amitābha, red in color, is seated in the mudra of supreme meditative concentration, and is consecrated with a precious diadem.

original: rnal 'byor pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i nga rgyal @278a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i nga rgyal @278a * //
translated: The yogin, with the pride of Amitābha, imagines that he is consecrated with the great wisdom of the bodhisattvas.

original: gyis rdo rje chos la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig chos dkyil 'khor lo skor bar bsam ma zhing /
analyzed: gyis rdo rje chos la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig chos dkyil 'khor lo skor bar bsam ma zhing /
translated: One should imagine that Vajradharma and so forth, together with the Bodhisattvas, turn the wheel of the Dharma circle.

original: badzra dharm'a hri:zlos shing srog par bya'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
analyzed: badzra dharm'a hri:zlos shing srog par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
translated: Reciting vajradharma hriḥ, one should draw them.

original: g-yon logs su rdo rje snyems ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub ba sna tshogs mdog can mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs te /
analyzed: g-yon logs su rdo rje snyems ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub ba sna tshogs mdog can mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs te /
translated: To the left of the Bhagavat Vairocana, in the place of Vajragarbha, one should draw the Bhagavat Amoghasiddhi, of variegated color, standing in the mudra of granting fearlessness,

original: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba rnal 'byor pa don yod par grub pa'i nga rgyal gyis g-yon logs su bzhugs par brtson pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'dul bar byed na /
analyzed: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba rnal 'byor pa don yod par grub pa'i nga rgyal gyis g-yon logs su bzhugs par brtson pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'dul bar byed na /
translated: consecrated with the crown of jewels, with the pride of being the yogin Amoghasiddhi. If one is able to subdue all sentient beings who are difficult to subdue,🔽what need is there to mention the holy ones?

original: dam pa rnams la smos kyang ci dgos zhes yid la zhing badzra karma zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa rnams la smos kyang ci dgos zhes yid la zhing badzra karma zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting vajra karma, one should draw them.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ni sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ni sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can /
translated: Among them, the Bhagavat Vairocana is the essence of the enjoyment body, and Akṣobhya and so forth are the essence of the emanation body, having the accouterments of a renunciate.

original: chos gos bsnams pa sna tshogs padma la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs shing /
analyzed: chos gos bsnams pa sna tshogs padma la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs shing /
translated: They hold Dharma robes, sit in vajra posture on multicolored lotuses, and face the Bhagavat Vairocana.

original: rdo rje dang rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs padma bsnams pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs padma bsnams pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'o //
translated: They hold a vajra, jewel, lotus, and multicolored lotus, and they possess sun maṇḍalas.

original: de nas rang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams su rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
analyzed: de nas rang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams su rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
translated: Then, in the southeast of one’s maṇḍala, there is a five-pronged vajra;

original: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje rin po che /
analyzed: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje rin po che /
translated: in the southwest, there is a vajra jewel;

original: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje padma dang / dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje /
analyzed: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje padma dang / dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje /
translated: in the northwest, there is a vajra lotus; and in the northeast, there is a multicolored vajra.

original: de la 'di rnams kyi snying bo ni satva badzra /
analyzed: de la 'di rnams kyi snying bo ni satva badzra /
translated: Their essence is stated to be satva vajra,

original: badzra ratna / badzra badmo ni /
analyzed: badzra ratna / badzra badmo ni /
translated: vajra ratna, vajra padma,🔽and vajra viśva.

original: bi shva badzra ni /🔽zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bi shva badzra ni / zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Viśva-vajra-ni.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang bzhad ma dang / glu chen mo dang / gar ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams snying po 'dis bris par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang bzhad ma dang / glu chen mo dang / gar ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams snying po 'dis bris par bya'o //
translated: In the intermediate directions of the outer enclosure, one should draw the host of goddesses called Lāsyā, Hāsyā, Gītikā, and Nṛtyā with this essence:

original: he ra ti badzra /
analyzed: he ra ti badzra /
translated: He-ra-ti-va-jra.

original: bi l'a sya ni trata /
analyzed: bi l'a sya ni trata /
translated: Vi-lā-syā ni-tra-ta.

original: he be ga ba t'i ba dzra /
analyzed: he be ga ba t'i ba dzra /
translated: He-va-ge-va-ti-va-jra.

original: ha se ha ta /
analyzed: ha se ha ta /
translated: Ha-se-ha-ta.

original: he badzra ra ti /
analyzed: he badzra ra ti /
translated: He-va-jra-ra-ti.

original: badzra g'i te ri te /
analyzed: badzra g'i te ri te /
translated: Va-jra-gī-ti-ri-te.

original: he ra ti badzra /
analyzed: he ra ti badzra /
translated: He-ra-ti-va-jra.

original: nri tya be ba be ba zhes bya ba yin no //🔽shar phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar dmar rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzin par brtson pa /🔽lho phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog dkar po //
analyzed: nri tya be ba be ba zhes bya ba yin no // shar phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar dmar rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzin par brtson pa / lho phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog dkar po //
translated: Nri-tya-be-va-va-be.🔽In the center of the eastern gate, one should draw the white-red Vajra Hook, striving to seize the Tathāgata with the hook.

original: rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin @278b gshegs pa thams cad 'dzud pa la brtson pa /
analyzed: rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin @278b gshegs pa thams cad 'dzud pa la brtson pa /
translated: In the center of the southern gate, one should draw the white Vajra Noose, striving to draw in all Tathāgatas with the noose.

original: nub phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching bar mdzad pa /
translated: In the center of the western gate, yellow Vajra-lock binds all the Tathagatas with a vajra-lock.

original: byang phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje dril bu sku mdog sngo bo phyag g-yas na rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa /
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje dril bu sku mdog sngo bo phyag g-yas na rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa /
translated: In the center of the northern gate, blue Vajra-bell holds a vajra-bell in his right hand,

original: phyag g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems te bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems te bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: and with his left hand he rests on his seat.🔽Their essence mantras are:

original: de rnams kyi snying po ni dza:badzra aam ku sha /🔽h'um badzra p'a sha /
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni dza:badzra aam ku sha / h'um badzra p'a sha /
translated: Jambha Vajra-hook,🔽Hum Vajra-noose,

original: bam badzra spho ta /
analyzed: bam badzra spho ta /
translated: Bam Vajra-fetter,

original: ho:badzra ghanta / zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ho:badzra ghanta / zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: and Ho Vajra-bell.

original: 'di dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga th'a ga par ma ma h'a au tp'a da a'a mi aa she sha na bi she sha sarba sa tva sa dh'a tu dha dra na hri te su khotta ma siddhi ni mitta aa dyanta bha ba siddhi ma he shva rya dhi pa tya yam / ya boddha satva ta ma h'a ya dhi /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, please grant the great consecration to me, the unsurpassed, the special, to all sentient beings, in order to purify the stream of consciousness, in order to obtain the highest success, in order to obtain the success of the great hero.🔽The consecration of the great hero,

original: ma he shva rya dhi pa tya yam /
analyzed: ma he shva rya dhi pa tya yam /
translated: the consecration of the great hero,

original: de nas slob ma'i snying gar su ra te sa ma ma ya stvam ho si ddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas slob ma'i snying gar su ra te sa ma ma ya stvam ho si ddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
translated: Then, at the heart of the disciple, with “Surate samayas tvam, hoḥ siddhi vajra yathā sukhaṃ,” generate the vajra as before.

original: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bya /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bya /
translated: The master should transform the disciple into the form of Vairocana.

original: de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
analyzed: de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
translated: Then, make offerings with flowers, and so on.

original: yon gyi mchog blangs te /
analyzed: yon gyi mchog blangs te /
translated: Take the best of gifts.

original: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chos dbang bskur la /
analyzed: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chos dbang bskur la /
translated: Consecrate the disciple with the vase outside.

original: dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas slob dpon 'jug pa'i tshul du zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas slob dpon 'jug pa'i tshul du zhugs par bya'o //
translated: First, with the mudra of entering, enter as if the master is entering.

original: de nas 'di skad ces smrar gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas 'di skad ces smrar gzhug go //
translated: Then, one should say this:

original: ma h'a ra ta su tri ta su to shya su su kho badzra satva a'a dya siddhya mam /
analyzed: ma h'a ra ta su tri ta su to shya su su kho badzra satva a'a dya siddhya mam /
translated: Mahārata sutri ta sutri toshya susukho vajrasattva ādyasiddhyamam.

original: de nas yang ngas 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: de nas yang ngas 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: Then I should say this:

original: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par yang mthong na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang cing dgos te de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas /
analyzed: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par yang mthong na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang cing dgos te de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas /
translated: “Today you have entered the family of all tathāgatas. I will generate in you the gnosis by which you will see the accomplishment of all tathāgatas, not to mention other accomplishments.

original: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
analyzed: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
translated: Do not speak of this to those who have not seen the great maṇḍala, lest your sacred pledge be damaged.”

original: de @280b nas rdo rje slob dpon rang gi sems ma'i rdo rje phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang / gyen du bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de @280b nas rdo rje slob dpon rang gi sems ma'i rdo rje phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang / gyen du bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then the vajra master should form the vajra fist with the left hand, place it on the head of the vajra disciple, and say this:

original: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te gang zhig la smras na glang ba 'gags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te gang zhig la smras na glang ba 'gags par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is your vajra pledge. If you tell anyone, your head will split open.

original: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas nas slob ma de 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas nas slob ma de 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, with that very pledge seal, and with this essence of the pledge, have the disciple drink it once, and say this:

original: de la dam tshig gi snying po 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la dam tshig gi snying po 'di yin te /
translated: The essence of the pledge is this:

original: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
translated: Today, Vajrasattva

original: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
analyzed: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
translated: has truly entered your heart.

original: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni//
analyzed: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni//
translated: If you tell this method,

original: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
analyzed: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
translated: he will immediately split your head open.

original: badzra au da ka tha tha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: badzra au da ka tha tha zhes bya'o //
translated: vajra-udaka tha-tha

original: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then say this to the disciple:

original: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis sangs rgyas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
analyzed: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis sangs rgyas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
translated: From now on, Vajrapāṇi is me. You must do whatever this buddha commands.

original: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig //
analyzed: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig //
translated: Do not disrespect me.

original: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
analyzed: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
translated: If you do not give up your discomfort, you will die and fall into hell!

original: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then say this:🔽All the Tathagatas consecrate you, and may Vajrasattva descend upon me.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i snying gar bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod🔽du gzhug go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i snying gar bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
translated: Then the Vajra Master should quickly form the Vajrasattva Seal and place it on his heart, and should make him say this:

original: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
translated: This is the Vajra Sacred Commitments,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
translated: known as Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
translated: May the unsurpassed Vajra Awareness

original: di ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra ae be sha aa /
analyzed: di ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra ae be sha aa /
translated: descend upon you this very day.🔽vajra-evaka sa

original: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o ;
translated: Recite this one hundred and eight times.

original: / yang khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems mas g-yas pa dral bar bya zhing aom bhu kham aa aa aa aa zhes lan brgya bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: / yang khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems mas g-yas pa dral bar bya zhing aom bhu kham aa aa aa aa zhes lan brgya bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Then, forming the wrathful fist, the Vajrasattva should open the right one, and recite Oṃ bhuḥ kham a ā ā ā one hundred times.

original: de nas de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba dor bar bya'o //
translated: Then, in the same way, one should cast the flower garland.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then, as before, one should give the garland empowerment.

original: de nas de bzhin du gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Then, in the same way, one should remove the blindfold.

original: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
translated: Then, with “Hevajra, behold the maṇḍala!” the maṇḍala should be shown.

original: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the mudra of entry, one should release it at the heart with “Tiṣṭha vajra” and so on.

original: de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar sgor @281a * //
analyzed: de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar sgor @281a * //
translated: Then, inside the outer maṇḍala, one should draw a multicolored lotus facing the eastern door.

original: bltas pa'i sna tshogs padma bris la slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du bsams te sems ma rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs la padma'i steng du las kyi phyag rgya bzhag nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
analyzed: bltas pa'i sna tshogs padma bris la slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du bsams te sems ma rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs la padma'i steng du las kyi phyag rgya bzhag nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
translated: Having imagined the disciple as Vairocana, one should bless him with Cittavajrā, place him on the lotus with the action seal, and receive the best offering.

original: slob ma la mchod yon byin te /
analyzed: slob ma la mchod yon byin te /
translated: Having given the disciple the welcome water,

original: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas /
analyzed: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas /
translated: then, having made offerings with the five offerings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la aom bhu kham aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la aom bhu kham aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
translated: Taking water from the victorious vase with the Tathagata's fist, one should confer initiation with OṂ BHŪKHAṂ OṂ VAJRA-ABHIṢIÑCA.

original: zhes bya bas de dbang bskur la 'di skad brjod cing chu de 'thung du yang gzhug go //
analyzed: zhes bya bas de dbang bskur la 'di skad brjod cing chu de 'thung du yang gzhug go //
translated: Having said this, one should also make the disciple drink that water.

original: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
translated: This is your hell water,

original: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
translated: which burns if you transgress your sacred pledge.

original: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
translated: If you keep your sacred pledge, it bestows spiritual powers.🔽Drink this water of vajra nectar.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya 'di //
translated: This mudra of the vajra and bell

original: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
analyzed: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
translated: should not be revealed to those who have not seen the mandala.🔽If it is revealed to a crowd of people,

original: skye bo 'dus nang bstan pa dang // dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
analyzed: skye bo 'dus nang bstan pa dang // dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
translated: it will be laughed at by those who lack faith.

original: slob mas kyang thal mo bskor bas slob dpon la phyag byas la rdo rje me tog la sogs pas dbang bskur pa thams cad blang bar bya zhing yon yang rgyun du dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: slob mas kyang thal mo bskor bas slob dpon la phyag byas la rdo rje me tog la sogs pas dbang bskur pa thams cad blang bar bya zhing yon yang rgyun du dbul bar bya'o //
translated: The disciple should also circle his palms in homage to the master and accept all the initiations conferred with the vajra, flowers, and so forth, and should also always offer a gift.

original: de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas kyang de dbang bskur la /🔽dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva aa bhi she ka na stvam /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas kyang de dbang bskur la / dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva aa bhi she ka na stvam /
translated: Then, with the pledge seal of the jewel, confer the empowerment of the jewel crown and the empowerment of the hanging ribbons.🔽With Jâḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, great bliss, vajra being, empowerment, be joyful!

original: aa bhi shanyts'i mi sarba badzra aa ti ba te tri to me bha ba /
analyzed: aa bhi shanyts'i mi sarba badzra aa ti ba te tri to me bha ba /
translated: Empower me with all vajras, I am the supreme being.

original: siddha n'a ma te /🔽bha ga b'a na ma h'a badzra dha ra su ra ta stv'am ham /
analyzed: siddha n'a ma te / bha ga b'a na ma h'a badzra dha ra su ra ta stv'am ham /
translated: I am the accomplished one.🔽I am the lord, the great vajra holder, I am the hero.🔽Vajra being, oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ,🔽and with the tathāgata fist, take up the tathāgata vajra and confer the empowerment of the vajra and the empowerment of the lord.

original: badzra satva aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs te rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang / bdag po'i dbang bskur ba yang byin la ming gi dbang bskur ba yang 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra satva aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs te rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang / bdag po'i dbang bskur ba yang byin la ming gi dbang bskur ba yang 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Also, confer the empowerment of the name with this:

original: aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a dha ra te badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa mam sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
analyzed: aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a dha ra te badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa mam sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
translated: Oṃ, all vajra lords, consecrate me, the great vajra holder, with the name Vajra, consecrate me, be true to your pledge, bhur bhuvaḥ svāhā.

original: de nas 'dis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'dis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then, with this, one should give the vajra conduct of spiritual powers.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a badzra dha ra /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a badzra dha ra /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, lords, consecrate me, the great vajra holder.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
translated: This is the nature of all buddhas,

original: rdo rje can gyi rdo rje yin //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi rdo rje yin //
translated: the vajra of the vajra holders.

original: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
translated: You should always hold it,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen brtul zhugs yin //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen brtul zhugs yin //
translated: the conduct of the great vajra holder.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub chen po'i sems yongs su mi spang bar rtag tu bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub chen po'i sems yongs su mi spang bar rtag tu bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'o //
translated: This is the supreme secret of all tathāgatas, the mind of great awakening, which should never be abandoned but always held. This is the secret.

original: he badzra garbha pa te aa bhi @281b shanytsi he badzra n'a ma siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
analyzed: he badzra garbha pa te aa bhi @281b shanytsi he badzra n'a ma siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
translated: Hevajra garbha pata abhiṣiñcāmi hevajra nāma siddhi samayas tvam bhur bhuvaḥ svāhā.

original: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba lnga bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba lnga bshad par bya'o //
translated: Then, having made offerings with the twelve seals, such as Rāgavajrā, one should explain the five secrets of all the tathāgatas.

original: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po lnga yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po lnga yin te /
translated: This is the five great secrets of all the tathāgatas:

original: rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig rten dbang dang don yod grub //🔽de bzhin gshegs kun nyid yin pas //
analyzed: rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig rten dbang dang don yod grub // de bzhin gshegs kun nyid yin pas //
translated: Akṣobhya, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, Amoghasiddhi,🔽and Vairocana, the fifth—

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bshad //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bshad //
translated: they are explained as all the tathāgatas.

original: de la rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni /
analyzed: de la rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni /
translated: The reality of the buddha families is as follows:

original: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa //
translated: Akṣobhya is Vajrasattva,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan rin chen dbang //🔽'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan rin chen dbang // 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos //
translated: Ratnasaṃbhava is Ratnasambhava,🔽Amitābha is Padmanateśvara,

original: rdo rje las ni rab grub yin //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni rab grub yin //
translated: and Amoghasiddhi is accomplished through Vajrakarma.

original: de nas de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
analyzed: de nas de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
translated: Then, holding the vajra with that [hand],

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //🔽dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o // dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: one should ring the Dharma-bell.🔽Having blessed the great seal with the pledge,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
translated: one should recite the essence.

original: zhes bya ba bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in this way.

original: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa blangs nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis mna' bsgags la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa blangs nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis mna' bsgags la bslab par bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken up the song of praise of the three sacred commitments, one should swear by the four seals of one's deity and train.

original: chog rgyas pa ni sngar bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: chog rgyas pa ni sngar bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: The extensive rite should be understood from the previously explained.

original: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /🔽// / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga bstan nas dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so / // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga bstan nas dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The extensive rite of the disciple's entry and so forth is complete.

original: de nas ma grub dngos grub mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas ma grub dngos grub mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, having explained the rite of the master's acts and the rite of the disciple's entry and so forth, in order to teach this rite for the master to train those who have obtained the sacred commitments and initiation in the knowledge of practice, [the Bhagavān] declares, then, for the sake of the non-accomplished supreme accomplishment, and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word then refers to immediately after.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya'am /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya'am /
