translated: [The master] should train the disciple in the knowledge of practice, either the doctrine seal,🔽the great seal,

original: phyag rgya chen po'am /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'am /
translated: The great seal.🔽🔽

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'am /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'am /
translated: The pledge seal or

original: las kyi phyag rgya zla ba gnyis kyis bsgrub sa pa na gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur pa de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya zla ba gnyis kyis bsgrub sa pa na gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur pa de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: action seal is accomplished by means of the two moons. When it is not accomplished, then immediately after that

original: grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: accomplishment is the perfection of the great seal, etc.

original: grub pa med pas na ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: grub pa med pas na ma grub pa ste /
translated: Since it is not accomplished, it is not accomplished.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ma grub pa ni dngos grub mchog go //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ma grub pa ni dngos grub mchog go //
translated: The supreme accomplishment is the non-accomplishment of the supreme accomplishment of the great seal, etc.

original: las rnams ni 'dod chags ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi'o //
analyzed: las rnams ni 'dod chags ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi'o //
translated: The actions are those characterized by mundane passion, etc.

original: rgyun ni rab 'byam ste /
analyzed: rgyun ni rab 'byam ste /
translated: The stream is the continuum.🔽That is called the stream of the actions,

original: de ni ma grub dngos grub mchog / las rnams kyi ni rgyun zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni ma grub dngos grub mchog / las rnams kyi ni rgyun zhes bya'o //
translated: which is not accomplished, the supreme accomplishment.

original: de nyid ni las gzhan las dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid ni las gzhan las dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: That itself is supreme, since it is superior to other actions.

original: sdig pa kun @282a * //
analyzed: sdig pa kun @282a * //
translated: All sins

original: sel zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa nyes par spyod pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sel zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa nyes par spyod pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'o //
translated: are destroyed, since it is the antidote to the misdeeds such as killing, etc.

original: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbye ba rnam pa brgyas dngos grub thams cad grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbye ba rnam pa brgyas dngos grub thams cad grub par byed pa'o //
translated: The variety is the accomplishment of all powers by means of the one hundred divisions.

original: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin te /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin te /
translated: In order means in sequence.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means by the sequence of the rite of the means of accomplishment as explained.

original: rab bshad ces bya ba de ltar gyur pa de rab tu bshad cing bstan bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rab bshad ces bya ba de ltar gyur pa de rab tu bshad cing bstan bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The best is that which has come to be. It is to be explained and taught.

original: khyed 'chad par byed pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: khyed 'chad par byed pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Who is the one who explains it?

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said thus, etc.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
translated: The word thus has the sense of indication.

original: nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na nad thams cad de skya rbab la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na nad thams cad de skya rbab la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since it is a disease and also all, it is all diseases, such as leprosy, etc.

original: mya ngan zhes bya ba ni sdug pa dang bral ba las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba'i rgyun no //
analyzed: mya ngan zhes bya ba ni sdug pa dang bral ba las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba'i rgyun no //
translated: Grief is the stream of mental unhappiness arising from separation from a loved one.

original: gnod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i don grub pa ma rnyed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: gnod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i don grub pa ma rnyed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Harm is the suffering that arises from not obtaining the desired object.

original: gnod byed ni gcong chen po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnod byed ni gcong chen po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The harmful are the great demons and so forth.

original: dug ni rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: dug ni rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Poison is of the nature of both moving and unmoving.

original: sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ba'i las byung ba'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ba'i las byung ba'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Applied poison is of the nature of the action of application.

original: gshed byed ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gshed byed ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir /
translated: The obstructors are those who obstruct others.

original: lha dgug pa dag sngags kyi stobs kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa'o //🔽g-yeng byed ni phur bu'i phyag rgya'am /
analyzed: lha dgug pa dag sngags kyi stobs kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa'o // g-yeng byed ni phur bu'i phyag rgya'am /
translated: The summoned gods are those generated by the power of mantra.

original: ming rus la sogs pa phyi'i phur bus lha la sogs pas phur bu btab pa'o //
analyzed: ming rus la sogs pa phyi'i phur bus lha la sogs pas phur bu btab pa'o //
translated: The distractors are those who are staked with the stake of the deity and so forth by means of the external stake of name, bone, and so forth.

original: ro langs ni 'dir gzhan dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir shi ba'i rol srin po gdug pa bcug pa'o //
analyzed: ro langs ni 'dir gzhan dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir shi ba'i rol srin po gdug pa bcug pa'o //
translated: The zombies are those in which a fierce demon is placed in a dead body in order to harm others.

original: sngags ni sgrub pa po'i don la gegs byed par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sngags ni sgrub pa po'i don la gegs byed par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The mantras are those that obstruct the purpose of the practitioner.

original: sman ni 'dod pa'i don la gegs byed pas gzung ngo //
analyzed: sman ni 'dod pa'i don la gegs byed pas gzung ngo //
translated: The medicines are those that obstruct the desired purpose.

original: bgegs ni sgrub pa po'i 'dod chags pa nang gi bgegs dang / dngos grub gyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir bgegs rnams so //
analyzed: bgegs ni sgrub pa po'i 'dod chags pa nang gi bgegs dang / dngos grub gyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir bgegs rnams so //
translated: The hindrances are the inner hindrances of the practitioner's passions, and the hindrances that are obstacles to spiritual powers.

original: log 'dren ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: log 'dren ni go bar zad do //
translated: The misleaders are understood.

original: sdig pa ni sgrub pa po la za bar brtson pa'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa ni sgrub pa po la za bar brtson pa'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The demons are rākṣasas, etc., who strive to devour the practitioner.

original: rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rims ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rims ni go bar zad do //
translated: Bad dreams, untimely death, and contagious diseases are understood.

original: gdon ni sems can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig pa mchog pas gsungs pa bco brgyad do //
analyzed: gdon ni sems can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig pa mchog pas gsungs pa bco brgyad do //
translated: The spirits are the eighteen spirits taught by the Supreme Knowledge Mantra, such as the divine spirits belonging to the continuum of sentient beings.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: The ḍākinīs are mundane and supramundane.

original: nye bar 'tshe ba ni khyim du srin po la sogs pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'tshe ba ni khyim du srin po la sogs pa snang ba'o //
translated: The harm is the appearance of rākṣasas, etc. in the home.

original: des nye bar bcom pa ni nye bar 'tshe ba'o //
analyzed: des nye bar bcom pa ni nye bar 'tshe ba'o //
translated: The harm that is done by them is the harm.

original: glo bur ba ni 'go @282b ba'i nad do //
analyzed: glo bur ba ni 'go @282b ba'i nad do //
translated: The sudden is a contagious disease.

original: nyes pa ni khang pa la sogs par nyes ba glo bur du byung ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni khang pa la sogs par nyes ba glo bur du byung ba'o //
translated: The faults are sudden faults in the house, etc.

original: nyon mongs pa ni lus kyi sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni lus kyi sdug bsngal lo //
translated: The afflictions are the sufferings of the body.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad ni go bar zad do //
translated: All the sufferings of body, speech, and mind are understood.

original: 'di rnams 'jig pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di rnams 'jig pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How are these destroyed?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “by the removal of the suffering of all the tathāgatas.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis nad btsir ba dang / mig dbye ba dang / snying gar gzhag pa dang / bya ba dang / khu tshur gyis bsal ba dang / kha zas dang khro bas phur bu dbyung ba dang / rting pas brdeg pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis nad btsir ba dang / mig dbye ba dang / snying gar gzhag pa dang / bya ba dang / khu tshur gyis bsal ba dang / kha zas dang khro bas phur bu dbyung ba dang / rting pas brdeg pa dang /
translated: The fist of all the tathāgatas presses down on the disease, opens the eyes, places [the fist] on the heart, acts, removes with the fist, removes the stake with food and anger, strikes with the heel,

original: aom bris nas phyi ba dang / sos bzung ba dang / h'um dang bcas pas bsnun pa dang / log 'dren la brdeg pa dang / tshon bris nas phyir byung ba dang / sbyin sreg bya ba dang / d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
analyzed: aom bris nas phyi ba dang / sos bzung ba dang / h'um dang bcas pas bsnun pa dang / log 'dren la brdeg pa dang / tshon bris nas phyir byung ba dang / sbyin sreg bya ba dang / d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
translated: writes oṃ, spits, holds with the teeth, strikes with hūṃ, strikes the evil forces, writes with colors, comes out, performs the burnt offering, performs the burnt offering of the dūrvā grass,

original: spyi bor gzhag pa dang / lta bas byab pa dang / skra nas bzung ste sbrug pa dang / kha tv'am ga steng du bzung ba dang / rang gi khyim du gzhag pa dang / zhugs pa dang / snying las gdon pa dang / lus las bskor ba dang /
analyzed: spyi bor gzhag pa dang / lta bas byab pa dang / skra nas bzung ste sbrug pa dang / kha tv'am ga steng du bzung ba dang / rang gi khyim du gzhag pa dang / zhugs pa dang / snying las gdon pa dang / lus las bskor ba dang /
translated: placing it in one's house,🔽entering it,🔽extracting it from the heart,🔽circling it around the body,🔽the manner of expelling the words,

original: tshig 'byin pa'i tshul dang / snying gar btsir ba'o //
analyzed: tshig 'byin pa'i tshul dang / snying gar btsir ba'o //
translated: and pressing it on the heart.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.🔽Form the two Tathagata fists.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /🔽g-yas pa kun du bsgreng ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te / g-yas pa kun du bsgreng ba ni /
translated: Raise the right one.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mos gzung ;
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mos gzung ;
translated: Hold the left vajra finger with the right vajra finger.

original: / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di //
analyzed: / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di //
translated: This mudra of supreme enlightenment

original: sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin byed //
translated: is the nature of the enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro //
translated: This is the Tathagata fist.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bskyed de /
translated: Through the self-consecration and so forth, generate yourself as Vairochana.

original: 'di bcings nas aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing des nad btsir la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis nad pa'i spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar du yongs su bkang bar bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di bcings nas aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing des nad btsir la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis nad pa'i spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar du yongs su bkang bar bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine that the disease is completely filled from the crown of the head of the patient down to the soles of the feet by the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: de lta bus ni nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, the disease will be pacified.

original: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
translated: Similarly, one should perform the yoga of Vairocana,🔽bind the mudra of supreme enlightenment, and imagine that one is mentally united with the one to be admitted.

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba dang / lhan cig yid kyis gcig tu byas la mya ngan gzhig pa'i bsam pas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rang gi mig phyi zhing bde ba skyes par bsams te /
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba dang / lhan cig yid kyis gcig tu byas la mya ngan gzhig pa'i bsam pas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rang gi mig phyi zhing bde ba skyes par bsams te /
translated: With the thought of destroying sorrow, one should open one's eyes with the mudra of supreme enlightenment and imagine that bliss arises.

original: de lta bus ni mya ngan 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mya ngan 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, sorrow will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas par bsams la bsgrub par bya ba @283a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas par bsams la bsgrub par bya ba @283a * //
translated: Having done everything in that way, one should imagine that one is united with the one to be admitted and admit the one to be admitted.

original: dang bde ba ngang yid bde ba skyes pa'i bsam bas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te snying gar gzhag par bya ste de lta bus ni gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang bde ba ngang yid bde ba skyes pa'i bsam bas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te snying gar gzhag par bya ste de lta bus ni gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having made all the preparations in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the heart of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /🔽nad pa'i lus la bya ba par bya zhing de dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar pos nad pa'i lus de bzhin du kun du gang bar bsams te de lta bus ni gnod byed thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te / nad pa'i lus la bya ba par bya zhing de dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar pos nad pa'i lus de bzhin du kun du gang bar bsams te de lta bus ni gnod byed thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.🔽Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas khu tshur gnyis kyis bsal bar byas pas ni dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas khu tshur gnyis kyis bsal bar byas pas ni dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should form the supreme enlightenment seal and place it on the body of the patient; by this all harm will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas kha zas rnyed pa na sngags bzla zhing kha zas de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsams la de nas kha zas de zos na sbyar ba'i dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas kha zas rnyed pa na sngags bzla zhing kha zas de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsams la de nas kha zas de zos na sbyar ba'i dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, having done everything, when one finds food, one should recite the mantra, and having imagined that food as the nature of Vairocana, then if one eats that food, the applied poison will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Likewise, having done everything, one should form the mudra of supreme enlightenment,

original: gshed byed la mngon du phyogs te khros pas rdo rje 'bar ba 'phangs te gshed byed kyi steng du babs par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gshed byed la mngon du phyogs te khros pas rdo rje 'bar ba 'phangs te gshed byed kyi steng du babs par bsam par bya ste /
translated: and having aimed it at the obstructor, one should imagine that the blazing vajra is cast by the angry one and falls upon the obstructor.

original: de lta bus ni 'jig par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la yid kyis phyung la de lta bus ni bka' 'khor du 'jug go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni 'jig par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la yid kyis phyung la de lta bus ni bka' 'khor du 'jug go //
translated: By that, he will be destroyed.🔽Likewise, having done everything, one should hold the kīla with the mudrā of supreme enlightenment, and having mentally cast it out, by that, one will enter the retinue of the command.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la bcings te /
translated: Likewise, having done everything, one should hold the kīla with the mudrā of supreme enlightenment, and having bound it,

original: des rting pas brdeg pa'i tshul du byas shing phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: des rting pas brdeg pa'i tshul du byas shing phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: One should make the gesture of trampling with the heel, and form the seal.

original: las kyang rdo rje 'bar ba spros la ro langs kyi steng du dbab par bya ste /
analyzed: las kyang rdo rje 'bar ba spros la ro langs kyi steng du dbab par bya ste /
translated: One should also emanate blazing vajras, and bring them down on the zombies.

original: de lta bus ni ro langs thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni ro langs thams cad 'jig go //
translated: By this, all zombies are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas yi ge aom bris la /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas yi ge aom bris la /
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should write the syllable oṃ with the mudra of supreme enlightenment.

original: sngags thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam bas dbyi bar bya ste /
analyzed: sngags thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam bas dbyi bar bya ste /
translated: One should erase it with the thought of destroying all mantras.

original: de lta bus ni sngags thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni sngags thams cad 'jig go //
translated: By this, all mantras are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
translated: Having done everything in the same way,

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te ;
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te ;
translated: one should form the mudra of supreme enlightenment,

original: sman thams cad bzung ba'i bsam bas de sogs gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: sman thams cad bzung ba'i bsam bas de sogs gzung bar bya ste /
translated: and one should hold all medicines with the thought of holding them.

original: de lta bus ni sman thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni sman thams cad 'jig go //
translated: By this, all medicines are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya tsham  ngam dang bcas pa dang / aom bhu kham h'um zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad la bsnun cing /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya tsham  ngam dang bcas pa dang / aom bhu kham h'um zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad la bsnun cing /
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should trample with the mudra of supreme enlightenment, and with the thought of destroying all obstacles, one should strike all obstacles with oṃ bhūka haṃ hūṃ.

original: bgegs thams cad @283b kyi steng du rdo rje 'bar ba yid kyis phab na de lta bus ni bgegs thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad @283b kyi steng du rdo rje 'bar ba yid kyis phab na de lta bus ni bgegs thams cad 'jig go //
translated: If one mentally causes a blazing vajra to fall upon all obstructors, in this way all obstructors will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la log 'dren bkug ste de'i steng du byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la log 'dren bkug ste de'i steng du byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar bar bya ste /
translated: Similarly, having done everything, one should summon the Māra and, above him, one should make the supreme enlightenment mudra, a blazing vajra.

original: de lta bus ni log 'dren thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni log 'dren thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all Māras will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas srin po la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad bsad pa'i bsam pa de nyid kyis dbyi bar bya zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas srin po la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad bsad pa'i bsam pa de nyid kyis dbyi bar bya zhing /
translated: Similarly, having done everything, one should kill all evil beings such as rākṣasas and so forth with the supreme enlightenment mudra, and with the very thought of killing, one should destroy them.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang de thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang de thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine that even the Blessed Vajra-fierce-fire reduces them to ashes.

original: de lta bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all evil will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
translated: Similarly, having done everything,

original: mdun du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spyan drangs te /
analyzed: mdun du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spyan drangs te /
translated: one should invite the Blessed Vairocana in front.

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: Having performed all the rites,

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg byas na /
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg byas na /
translated: If one performs the burnt offering with the thought of destroying all bad dreams with the mudra of supreme enlightenment,

original: de lta bus ni rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: de lta bus ni rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro /
translated: all bad dreams will be destroyed by that.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
translated: Having done everything in that way,

original: bcom ldan 'das thab kyi dbus su spyan drangs la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thab kyi dbus su spyan drangs la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
translated: one should invite the Blessed One into the middle of the hearth and perform all the rites.

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one performs the burnt offering of a skull with the mudra of supreme enlightenment, untimely death will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la spyi bor bzhag ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la spyi bor bzhag ste /
translated: Having done everything in that way, one should form the mudra of supreme enlightenment, place it on one's head,

original: byams pa'i lta bas bsgrub par bya ba la bya bcing bcom ldan 'das gtsug 'phyang gis kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kun du gang la rims bcom bar gyur par bsam bar bya ste /
analyzed: byams pa'i lta bas bsgrub par bya ba la bya bcing bcom ldan 'das gtsug 'phyang gis kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kun du gang la rims bcom bar gyur par bsam bar bya ste /
translated: and with the gaze of love, bind the action to be accomplished. One should imagine that the body of the Blessed One with the topknot fills the entire body of the one to be accomplished, and the plague is destroyed.

original: de lta bus ni rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, all plagues will be destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas nad pa'i skra nas bzung la sbrug cing /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas nad pa'i skra nas bzung la sbrug cing /
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should hold the hair of the patient with the mudra of supreme enlightenment and shake it.

original: bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po ches bsgrub par bya ba'i lus las gdon blangs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po ches bsgrub par bya ba'i lus las gdon blangs te /
translated: One should imagine that the spirit is drawn out of the body of the one to be tormented by the Blessed Powerful Heruka

original: gzhan du dor bar bsam bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan du dor bar bsam bar bya ste /
translated: and is cast elsewhere.

original: de lta bus ni gdon 'jig go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gdon 'jig go //
translated: By this, the spirit is destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /🔽de'i steng na kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i tshul du gzhag cing bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la sogs pa dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab nas mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya rnams thal bar mdzad par
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te / de'i steng na kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i tshul du gzhag cing bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la sogs pa dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab nas mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya rnams thal bar mdzad par
translated: Having done everything in the same way, one should bind the mudra of supreme enlightenment🔽and place it on the head of the one to be tormented in the manner of holding a katvanga.

original: bsam par bya ste /🔽de lta @284a * //
analyzed: bsam par bya ste / de lta @284a * //
translated: One should imagine oneself as glorious Heruka, and imagine that the Blessed One, glorious Heruka, together with the rest, pervades the body of the one to be tormented, and that the mudras of the dakinis reduce him to ashes.

original: bus ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bus ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all the dakinis that exist in the body of the one to be tormented are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te rang gi khyim du bskor la rdo rje rigs kyis kyang yams kun du 'byin par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te rang gi khyim du bskor la rdo rje rigs kyis kyang yams kun du 'byin par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, having done everything, form the supreme enlightenment, and having circumambulated one's house, one should imagine that the Vajra Family expels all epidemics.

original: de lta bus ni yams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni yams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all epidemics are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
translated: Likewise, having done everything, form the supreme enlightenment,🔽and having placed it in one's house, imagine that the Blessed One Vajra Humkara, in the manner of emitting the Vajra Family, is intent on expelling all evildoers from that house.

original: rang gi khyim du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi khyim der rdo rje rigs 'byin pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa thams cad nges par skrod par mdzad pa la brtson par bsams na de lta bus ni nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: rang gi khyim du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi khyim der rdo rje rigs 'byin pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa thams cad nges par skrod par mdzad pa la brtson par bsams na de lta bus ni nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'jig go //
translated: By this, all calamities are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
translated: Likewise, having done everything, form the supreme enlightenment,

original: rang gi khyim du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar bos khang ba thams cad snang bar mdzad cing /
analyzed: rang gi khyim du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar bos khang ba thams cad snang bar mdzad cing /
translated: and having entered one's house, imagine that the Blessed One Vairocana, with a white colored body, illuminates the whole house,🔽and that the Blessed One Vajra Dharma, with a yellow colored body,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na bzhugs par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na bzhugs par bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine that he is seated in the center of the assembly of all the Tathagatas.

original: de lta bus ni glo bur ba'i nyes pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni glo bur ba'i nyes pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, the adventitious faults are removed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
translated: In the same way, one should form everything, bind the supreme enlightenment,

original: rang gi snying ga nas bton te /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga nas bton te /
translated: and take it out from one's heart.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par byas par bsams na de lta bus ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par byas par bsams na de lta bus ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should imagine that it pervades the body of the one to be accomplished by the Blessed Vairocana. By this, all the afflictions are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te lus la bskor bas lus thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te lus la bskor bas lus thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
translated: In the same way, one should form everything, bind the supreme enlightenment, and circle it around the body. One should imagine that the whole body is the nature of Vairocana.

original: de lta bus ni lus kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni lus kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all the sufferings of the body are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
translated: In the same way, one should form everything, bind the supreme enlightenment,

original: des tshig 'byin pa'i tshul du bya zhing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi ngo bor bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: des tshig 'byin pa'i tshul du bya zhing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi ngo bor bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine that one's own body is in the nature of Vairocana's face, and that the mantra is uttered in the manner of a voice.

original: de lta bus ni ngag gi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni ngag gi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig go //
translated: In this way, all suffering of speech is destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
translated: Having done everything in this way, one should bind the supreme enlightenment,

original: snying ga'i phyogs su btsir zhing snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na de lta bus ni sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs su btsir zhing snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na de lta bus ni sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and press it on the heart region. If one meditates on the mind-vajra at the heart, in this way all suffering of mind is pacified.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga bsgrub par gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga bsgrub par gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has taught the twenty-five accomplishments from the supreme enlightenment seal.

original: da ni de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga pos gzhan bya bar @284b gsungs pa ni tshe chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga pos gzhan bya bar @284b gsungs pa ni tshe chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Now, he teaches the twenty-five accomplishments from the pledge seal of that very [enlightenment], saying great life and so on.

original: 'dis kyang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis kyang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This also teaches the following.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings la rang gi snying gar brtan par bya zhing rang gi snying gar rnam
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings la rang gi snying gar brtan par bya zhing rang gi snying gar rnam
translated: Having performed the yoga of Bhagavat Vairocana just as it is, one should bind the supreme body of all the tathagatas with the pledge seal of Vairocana and stabilize it at one’s heart, visualizing Vairocana at one’s heart.🔽

original: par snang mdzad zla ba'i mdog can bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: par snang mdzad zla ba'i mdog can bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having performed the yoga of the Blessed Vairocana just as it is, one should bind the supreme body of all the tathagatas with the pledge seal of Vairocana and stabilize it at one’s heart, visualizing Vairocana on a moon at one’s heart.

original: de lta bus ni tshe chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni tshe chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one’s life will be extended.

original: de nyid dbang po thams cad du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lo bcu drug lon pa tsam dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid dbang po thams cad du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lo bcu drug lon pa tsam dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having placed that [seal] on all one’s sense faculties, one should visualize the Blessed Vairocana, about the age of sixteen, and oneself becoming one, like water poured into water.

original: de lta bus ni na tshod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni na tshod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one’s youth will be extended.

original: de nyid khar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ba'i sgo nas zhugs te /
analyzed: de nyid khar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ba'i sgo nas zhugs te /
translated: Having placed that [seal] in one’s mouth, one should visualize the Blessed Vairocana entering through one’s mouth and dissolving into the moon at one’s heart.

original: yan lag thams cad khyab nas rnam par snang mdzad du byas par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: yan lag thams cad khyab nas rnam par snang mdzad du byas par bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine that it pervades all the limbs and transforms them into Vairocana.

original: de lta bus ni gzugs chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gzugs chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one will increase the great form.

original: de nyid khar bskor la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yang dag par brgyan pa /🔽dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yan lag rnam par mdzes pa kha'i sgo nas zhugs te /
analyzed: de nyid khar bskor la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yang dag par brgyan pa / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yan lag rnam par mdzes pa kha'i sgo nas zhugs te /
translated: One should imagine that it enters through the mouth of the Bhagavat Vairocana, who is adorned with the thirty-two major marks,

original: yan lag thams cad khyab pas rnam par snang mdzad du byas par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: yan lag thams cad khyab pas rnam par snang mdzad du byas par bsam par bya ste /
translated: and that it pervades all the limbs, beautified with the eighty minor marks, and transforms them into Vairocana.

original: de lta bus ni kha dog chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni kha dog chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one will increase the great color.

original: de nyid dbral bar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis khams gsum gyis chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de nyid dbral bar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis khams gsum gyis chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
translated: One should imagine that it enters through the crown of the head of the Bhagavat Vairocana, who is anointed with the consecration of the Dharma King of the three realms,🔽and that it pervades all the limbs, and transforms them into Vairocana.

original: khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid thob bas bdag nyid gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid thob bas bdag nyid gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should think of oneself as Vairocana of infinite splendor, since one has obtained the sovereignty of the Dharma of the three realms.

original: de lta bus ni gzi brjid chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gzi brjid chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this means, one's splendor increases.

original: de nyid snying gar gzhag ste rang gi snying gar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid snang bar byas shing de'i mdangs dang ldan bar bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid snying gar gzhag ste rang gi snying gar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid snang bar byas shing de'i mdangs dang ldan bar bsam par bya ste /
translated: Placing that very [Vairocana] at one's heart, one should think that the Blessed One Vairocana, abiding in one's heart, illuminates oneself and one becomes endowed with his radiance.

original: de lta bus ni mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this means, one's radiance increases.

original: de nyid phrag pa gnyis su bzhag la bcom lan 'das rnam par snang mdzad stobs nam mkha' dang mnyam par rang gi yan lag khyab cing de'i stobs dang ldan par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid phrag pa gnyis su bzhag la bcom lan 'das rnam par snang mdzad stobs nam mkha' dang mnyam par rang gi yan lag khyab cing de'i stobs dang ldan par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Placing that very [Vairocana] on both shoulders, one should think that the Blessed One Vairocana, whose strength is equal to space, pervades one's limbs and one becomes endowed with his strength.

original: de lta bus ni stobs 'phel bar @285a * //
analyzed: de lta bus ni stobs 'phel bar @285a * //
translated: By this means, one's strength increases.

original: 'gyur ro // de gnyis brla gnyis su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pas yan lag thams cad la khyab cing de'i spro ba dang ldan par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // de gnyis brla gnyis su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pas yan lag thams cad la khyab cing de'i spro ba dang ldan par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having placed those two on the two thighs, one should imagine that Bhagavat Amoghasiddhi pervades all the limbs and is delighted with that.

original: de lta bus ni spro ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni spro ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one's enthusiasm increases.

original: de nyid bcings la des phreng ba bcings pa'i tshul du bya zhing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sna tshogs phreng ba'i dbang gis bdag nyid dbang bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyi rang bzhin du gyur bar bsam par gyur pa
analyzed: de nyid bcings la des phreng ba bcings pa'i tshul du bya zhing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sna tshogs phreng ba'i dbang gis bdag nyid dbang bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyi rang bzhin du gyur bar bsam par gyur pa
translated: Binding that, one should do it in the manner of binding a garland, and imagine that one is empowered by Bhagavat Vairocana with the empowerment of the garland of various [offerings], and one becomes the nature of the great bodhisattva Vajrakarma.

original: ste / de lta bus ni brtson 'grus 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ste / de lta bus ni brtson 'grus 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one's effort increases.

original: de nyid dbang po thams cad la bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dbang gis dbang bskur bas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid dbang po thams cad la bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dbang gis dbang bskur bas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having placed it on all the sense organs, one should imagine that one is empowered by the empowerment of Ārya Ākāśagarbha, and that one’s nature is that of the jewel lineage.

original: de lta bus ni dpal chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni dpal chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one’s great glory will increase.

original: de nyid spyi bor bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang gis dbang bskur bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid spyi bor bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang gis dbang bskur bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having placed it on one’s crown, one should imagine that one is empowered by the empowerment of Vajrasattva, and that one becomes Vajrasattva.

original: de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skal ba bzang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skal ba bzang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one’s good fortune of glorious Vajrasattva will increase.

original: de nyid khar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kha'i sgo nas zhugs pas lus thams cad khyab pas rnam par snang mdzad du gyur cing rnam par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid khar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kha'i sgo nas zhugs pas lus thams cad khyab pas rnam par snang mdzad du gyur cing rnam par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Having placed it in one’s mouth, one should imagine that one becomes Vairocana, by the Bhagavān Vairocana entering through one’s mouth and pervading one’s entire body.

original: de lta bus ni bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, merit increases.

original: de nyid kha nas byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rang gi kha nas byung bas phyogs bcur rang gi ming sgrogs par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kha nas byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rang gi kha nas byung bas phyogs bcur rang gi ming sgrogs par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Then, by emerging from one's mouth, one should imagine that bodhisattvas equal to the atoms of all world systems, who are all Samantabhadra, emerge from one's mouth and proclaim one's name in the ten directions.

original: de lta bus ni ming 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni ming 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one's fame increases.

original: de nyid thams cad du bskor la rang gi lus byung ba de'i phyogs bcur rang gi snyan pas khyab par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid thams cad du bskor la rang gi lus byung ba de'i phyogs bcur rang gi snyan pas khyab par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Then, by turning in all directions, one should imagine that one's body pervades the ten directions with one's fame.

original: de lta bus ni snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one's fame increases.

original: de nyid phyogs kun nas bskor la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems grags pa sgrogs par bdag nyid bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid phyogs kun nas bskor la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems grags pa sgrogs par bdag nyid bsam par bya ste /
translated: Then, by turning in all directions, one should imagine that one is oneself the Blessed Vajrasattva, proclaiming the fame of bodhicitta.

original: de lta bus ni grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one's fame increases.

original: de nyid bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa bsgoms na de lta bus ni @285b dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa bsgoms na de lta bus ni @285b dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on the recollection of the Tathāgatas while bound in that very way, in this way the recollection will increase.

original: de nyid bcings la snying gnas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas na blo gros 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la snying gnas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas na blo gros 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one makes the heart emerge from the heart while bound in that very way, the intellect will increase.

original: de nyid snying gar bzhag la dga' ba thob par byas na de lta bus ni brtan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid snying gar bzhag la dga' ba thob par byas na de lta bus ni brtan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one attains joy by placing that very [vajra] at the heart, in this way one will become firm.

original: de nyid bcings la sangs rgyas kyi tshul du bdag nyid bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la sangs rgyas kyi tshul du bdag nyid bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on oneself as the Tathāgata while bound in that very way, the conception of the Tathāgata will increase.

original: de nyid bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad du bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad du bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on all buddhas while bound in that very way, the samādhi of the Tathāgata will increase.

original: de nyid bcings la phung po lnga po bzhag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phung po lnga 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la phung po lnga po bzhag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phung po lnga 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one places the five aggregates while bound in that very way, the Tathāgata’s five supramundane aggregates will increase.

original: de nyid rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar bskor zhing don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams na de lta bus ni don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar bskor zhing don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams na de lta bus ni don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Spinning it like a potter's wheel, and imagining oneself to be Amoghasiddhi, one will increase the creation of the nature of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nyid bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na /
translated: Binding it, and meditating on oneself as the body of Vairochana,

original: de lta bus ni sku 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni sku 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will increase the body.

original: de nyid lce la bzhag na de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid lce la bzhag na de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Placing it on the tongue, one will increase the speech of the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid bcings la yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms na /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms na /
translated: Binding it, and mentally bowing to all Tathagatas, and meditating on the sattva-vajra in one's heart,

original: de lta bus ni thugs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thugs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will increase the mind.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi las nyi shu rtsa lnga pa bsgrub par gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi las nyi shu rtsa lnga pa bsgrub par gsungs nas /
translated: Having thus taught the accomplishment of the twenty-five supreme activities of all Tathagatas,

original: da ni de nyid kyi las nyi shu rtsa lnga gzhan dag bsgrub par gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: da ni de nyid kyi las nyi shu rtsa lnga gzhan dag bsgrub par gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, it is said that one should accomplish the other twenty-five activities of that [vajra] recitation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is said, the giving of all the Tathagatas, and so forth.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of the Blessed One Vairochana,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
translated: one should imagine oneself as the supreme body of all the Tathagatas,

original: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad sgeg mo rtogs pa'i sbyin pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad sgeg mo rtogs pa'i sbyin pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
translated: binding the supreme body of all the Tathagatas, and giving the gift of the realization of the goddess Lalita to all sentient beings in the ten directions, fulfilling all their wishes.

original: de bzhin du gtong ba rjes su dran pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtong ba rjes su dran pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, by recollecting giving, one will accomplish the perfection of giving.

original: de nyid bcings la rdo rje phreng ba ma rtogs pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yang dag par sbyor ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims rjes su dran pas ni tshul @286a * //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la rdo rje phreng ba ma rtogs pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yang dag par sbyor ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims rjes su dran pas ni tshul @286a * //
translated: By not understanding the vajra-garland, he binds that very [vajra-garland] and emanates it to all realms of sentient beings.

original: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: Similarly, by recollecting morality, he accomplishes the perfection of morality.

original: de nyid bcings la sems can gyi khams thams cad la byams pa yang dag par spros te de lta bus ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la sems can gyi khams thams cad la byams pa yang dag par spros te de lta bus ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Binding that very [vajra-garland], he emanates loving kindness to all realms of sentient beings, and by that he accomplishes the perfection of patience.

original: de nyid bcings la gar ma'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la gar ma'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Binding that very [vajra-garland], he should establish all realms of sentient beings in the perfection of effort through the method of the dancing girl.

original: de lta bus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: By that, he accomplishes the perfection of effort.

original: de nyid bcings la rdo rje me tog me'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la rdo rje me tog me'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Binding that very [vajra-garland], he should establish all realms of sentient beings in the perfection of concentration through the method of the vajra flower flame.

original: de lta bus ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: In this way, the perfection of meditative stabilization is accomplished.

original: de nyid bcings la rdo rje bdug pa ma'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la rdo rje bdug pa ma'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Binding just that, one should establish the realm of sentient beings in the perfection of wisdom by the method of Vajradhupa.

original: de lta bus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: In this way, the perfection of wisdom is accomplished.

original: de nyid bcings la /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la /
translated: Binding just that,

original: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes thob par bsgoms na /
analyzed: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes thob par bsgoms na /
translated: if one meditates on oneself as attaining the exalted wisdom of Vairochana,

original: de lta bus ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: in this way, the perfection of exalted wisdom is accomplished.

original: de nyid bcings la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: Binding just that, by meditating on the perfection of power, the perfection of power is accomplished.

original: de nyid bcings la rdo rje dril bu'i tshul du bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la rdo rje dril bu'i tshul du bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Binding just that, one should meditate on oneself in the manner of the vajra bell.

original: de lta bus ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
translated: In this way, the perfection of method is accomplished.

original: de nyid bcings la mdun du rdo rje bsgoms na /
analyzed: de nyid bcings la mdun du rdo rje bsgoms na /
translated: Binding just that, if one meditates on a vajra in front,

original: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'grub bo //
translated: in this way, the vajra is accomplished.

original: de nyid bcings la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzugs rnam par bsgoms na de'i sgrub pa gnas pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de nyid bcings la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzugs rnam par bsgoms na de'i sgrub pa gnas pa 'grub bo //
translated: one will accomplish the retention of the practice.

analyzed: de nyid bcings la tshul gsum gyi bshad pa'i chos bsgoms na chos 'grub bo //

analyzed: de nyid bcings la rdo rje las kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms te /
translated: If one visualizes oneself in the form of Vajrakarma,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las bsgoms na las 'grub pa'o //

analyzed: phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sems can thams cad kyi don byed par bsgoms pas ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don 'grub bo //

analyzed: de nyid bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na de lta bus ni sku 'grub bo //
