analyzed: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: and meditate on oneself in the manner of Samantabhadra’s conduct.

original: de lta bus ni kun du bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni kun du bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will perfect the various conducts of Samantabhadra.

original: 'di nyid bcings la aom tsint'a ma ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid bcings la aom tsint'a ma ni /
translated: Binding that [mudra], one should recite “Oṃ cintamani,”

original: zhes zlos shing rdo rje dpal du bdag nyid bsams la sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yid la bya ste /
analyzed: zhes zlos shing rdo rje dpal du bdag nyid bsams la sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yid la bya ste /
translated: and imagine oneself as Vajraśrī, and imagine that all the wishes of all the realms of sentient beings are fulfilled.

original: de lta bus ni sems can gyi don 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni sems can gyi don 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the welfare of sentient beings will be accomplished.

original: aom aa ni ro dha /🔽zhes @287a * //
analyzed: aom aa ni ro dha / zhes @287a * //
translated: Om aniruddha.

original: zlos shing bdag nyid dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'pho ba nye bar bstan nas sh'akya'i rigs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su 'jug par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: zlos shing bdag nyid dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'pho ba nye bar bstan nas sh'akya'i rigs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su 'jug par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting this, one should imagine that one is descending from the excellent abode of Tushita, and entering the womb of Queen Maya in the Shakya clan.

original: de lta bus ni lhums su zhugs pa grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni lhums su zhugs pa grub bo //
translated: In this way, the descent into the womb is accomplished.🔽Om jati vibhrata.

original: aom dz'a ti bi barte zhes zlos shing bdag nyid yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: aom dz'a ti bi barte zhes zlos shing bdag nyid yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting this, one should imagine that one is born from the womb of one's mother in the form of all-accomplished enlightenment.

original: de lta bus ni skye ba'i sa yang dag par ston par 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni skye ba'i sa yang dag par ston par 'grub bo //
translated: In this way, the display of birth is accomplished.

original: aom sarb'a bhi dzny'a ni /
analyzed: aom sarb'a bhi dzny'a ni /
translated: Om sarva abhijna.

original: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa la sogs pa bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa la sogs pa bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting this, one should imagine that one is displaying the sports of a youth.

original: de lta bus ni gzhon nu'i rol par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gzhon nu'i rol par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one becomes a youth.

original: aom ma h'i ba r'a ga dharma /
analyzed: aom ma h'i ba r'a ga dharma /
translated: Om mahavira dharmaraja.

original: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid mngon par 'byung bar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid mngon par 'byung bar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting this, one should meditate on oneself as going forth.

original: de lta bus ni de grub par 'gyur ro //🔽aom b'i rya k'a btse /
analyzed: de lta bus ni de grub par 'gyur ro // aom b'i rya k'a btse /
translated: By this, that is accomplished.

original: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ bhikṣā-caks, one should imagine oneself abiding in the practice of austerities.

original: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
translated: By this, that is accomplished.

original: aom sarb'a ga mi ni zhes zlos shing bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i snying por 'gro bar bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: aom sarb'a ga mi ni zhes zlos shing bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i snying por 'gro bar bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ sarva-ga-mi-ni, one should imagine oneself going to the site of great awakening.

original: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //🔽aom badzra dhi ra tsitte h'um /
analyzed: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo // aom badzra dhi ra tsitte h'um /
translated: By this, that is accomplished.

original: zhes zlos shing rang gi lus las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyung la des bdud kyi sde bcom par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes zlos shing rang gi lus las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyung la des bdud kyi sde bcom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ vajra-dhīra-citte-hūṃ, one should imagine that one’s body emits a four-division army, which conquers the hosts of Māra.

original: de lta bus ni bdud brtul pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni bdud brtul pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, the subjugation of Māra is accomplished.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga te zhes zlos shing mngon par byang chub pa mngon du bya bar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga te zhes zlos shing mngon par byang chub pa mngon du bya bar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ sarva-tathāgata-abhiṣekata-samaya-śrī-oṃ, one should meditate on the manifestation of manifest awakening.

original: de lta bus ni mngon par byang chub pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mngon par byang chub pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, manifest awakening is accomplished.

original: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho dharma t'a dzny'a na pi shuddhe zhes zlos shing bdag nyid w'a r'a na s'i ra chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho dharma t'a dzny'a na pi shuddhe zhes zlos shing bdag nyid w'a r'a na s'i ra chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ svabhāva śuddho’haṃ dharmatā jñānapiśodhani, one should meditate on oneself as turning the wheel of the Dharma at Vārāṇasī.

original: de lta bus ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'grub bo ;
analyzed: de lta bus ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'grub bo ;
translated: By this, the wheel of the Dharma is accomplished.

original: / aom karma bi shva dha ni zhes zlos shing bdag nyid mu stegs can gzhan dag tshar gcod par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: / aom karma bi shva dha ni zhes zlos shing bdag nyid mu stegs can gzhan dag tshar gcod par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ karmaviśodhani, one should imagine oneself as destroying other tīrthikas.

original: de lta bus ni mu stegs pa gzhan tshar gcod pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mu stegs pa gzhan tshar gcod pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, the destruction of other tīrthikas is accomplished.

original: h'um ni su bha badzra ni phat ces zlos shing bdag nyid 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rgyal bar byed cing rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: h'um ni su bha badzra ni phat ces zlos shing bdag nyid 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rgyal bar byed cing rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Huṃ suṃ bhava vajra ni phaṭ, one should imagine oneself as conquering the entire triple world and as having the nature of the vajra family.

original: de lta bus ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'grub bo //
translated: By this, the conquest of the triple world is accomplished.

original: aom ma h'a r'a ge zhes zlos shing bdag nyid lha las 'bab par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: aom ma h'a r'a ge zhes zlos shing bdag nyid lha las 'bab par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ mahārāge, one should meditate on oneself as descending from the gods.

original: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
translated: By this, that is accomplished.

original: aom dza badzra ni zhes zlos shing 'dus pa chen po byin gyis brlab par @287b bsgom bar bya ste //
analyzed: aom dza badzra ni zhes zlos shing 'dus pa chen po byin gyis brlab par @287b bsgom bar bya ste //
translated: Reciting Oṃ jaḥ vajrī, imagine that you bless the great assembly.

original: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
translated: By this, you will accomplish the blessing.

original: aom h'um sarba dharma ni zhes zlos shing gdug pa thams cad rdo rje rigs kyi tshul gyis yid kyis gdul bar bya ste /
analyzed: aom h'um sarba dharma ni zhes zlos shing gdug pa thams cad rdo rje rigs kyi tshul gyis yid kyis gdul bar bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ hūṃ sarva dharma, imagine that you mentally tame all evildoers by means of the vajra family.

original: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba 'grub bo //
translated: By this, you will accomplish the taming of all evildoers.

original: aom hri zhes zlos shing bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i skur bsams la gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pas sems can gdul bar yid kyis bya ste /
analyzed: aom hri zhes zlos shing bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i skur bsams la gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pas sems can gdul bar yid kyis bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ hrīḥ, imagine that you are the body of Loktāta, and mentally tame sentient beings by means of manifesting all forms.

original: de lta bus ni 'dul ba la rab tu 'jog pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni 'dul ba la rab tu 'jog pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, you will accomplish the establishment of those to be tamed.

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes zlos shing ngan song gsum yid kyis bton la gsad bar bya zhing sems can de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes nas byang chub sems dpar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes zlos shing ngan song gsum yid kyis bton la gsad bar bya zhing sems can de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes nas byang chub sems dpar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ akaro mukhaṃ, one should imagine that one is killing the three lower realms, and that those sentient beings are born in the presence of the Bhagavat Vairocana and become bodhisattvas.

original: de lta bus ni ngan song thams cad las gdon pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni ngan song thams cad las gdon pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, one accomplishes the deliverance from all lower realms.

original: aom pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta zhes zlos shing bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde thams cad ston pa la brtson pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: aom pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta zhes zlos shing bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde thams cad ston pa la brtson pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ prajñāpāramitā, one should imagine that one is the Tathāgata, striving to teach all the sūtras such as the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: de lta bus ni mdo sde thams cad ston pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mdo sde thams cad ston pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, one accomplishes the teaching of all the sūtras.

original: aom ba h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyis rtog pa thams cad brtan par byed par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: aom ba h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyis rtog pa thams cad brtan par byed par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ vaṃ, one should meditate that one is the vajra realm, and so forth, stabilizing all the worldly and transcendent mantras.

original: de lta bus ni rtog pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rtog pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, one accomplishes the consecration of all conceptualizations.

original: aa zhes zlos shing sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa rnams la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa ster bar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: aa zhes zlos shing sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa rnams la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa ster bar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting “a,” one should meditate on the bestowal of buddhahood, etc. , to those who are practicing for the sake of buddhahood, etc.

original: de lta bus ni dngos grub thams cad ster ba 'grub bo ;
analyzed: de lta bus ni dngos grub thams cad ster ba 'grub bo ;
translated: By this, one accomplishes the bestowal of all powers.

original: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a y'a gre zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a y'a gre zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Reciting “oṃ sarva tathāgata kāya grha,” one should meditate on one’s own body as having the nature of Vairocana, etc.

original: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog rab tu thob pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog rab tu thob pa 'grub bo //
translated: By this, one accomplishes the attainment of the supreme body of all the tathāgatas.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'ag pi shuddhe zhes zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rang bzhin du bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab tu thob pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'ag pi shuddhe zhes zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rang bzhin du bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab tu thob pa 'grub bo //
translated: Reciting “oṃ sarva tathāgata vāca viśuddhe,” one should meditate on the nature of the speech of all the tathāgatas. By this, one accomplishes the attainment of the supreme speech of all the tathāgatas.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzre ni zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgo par bya ste /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzre ni zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgo par bya ste /
translated: Reciting Oṃ sarva tathāgata citta vajrī, one should visualize a five-pronged vajra on the moon at one’s heart.

original: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs @288a * //
analyzed: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs @288a * //
translated: By this, one attains the mind of all the Tathāgatas,

original: rab tu thob cing rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu thob cing rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and one attains complete liberation.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i sgo rnams rnam par sbyong ba ni rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i sgo rnams rnam par sbyong ba ni rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
translated: There, the purification of the doors of training in the generation of the great thought of enlightenment of all the Tathāgatas and so forth is the miracle.

original: de sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Its accomplishment is the perfection.

original: 'dir thams cad la /
analyzed: 'dir thams cad la /
translated: Here, in all of them,

original: yang de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
analyzed: yang de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
translated: one should know that, in the same way, having performed the yoga of Vairocana,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
translated: one should bind the supreme body of all the Tathāgatas,

original: bsgom par bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: and one should know that it is to be cultivated.

original: ji ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: ji ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
translated: As for “by these mudrās,” the meaning is self-evident.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra of enlightenment of all the Tathagatas is Vairochana, etc.

original: de rnams kyi byang chub ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi byang chub ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The enlightenment of those is nondual intuition.

original: de'i rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra of that is the mandala of Vairochana.

original: de'i rnam pa la rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa la rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //
translated: The conception of that is the imagination.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang nye bar btags pas de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang nye bar btags pas de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is so called because it is figuratively designated to the sound that teaches that.

original: de nyid ni ston pa ste bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni ston pa ste bya ba'o //
translated: That itself is the teaching, the action.

original: de'i rgyas pa ni rgyun no //
analyzed: de'i rgyas pa ni rgyun no //
translated: The continuity of that is the stream.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the mandala of the Blessed One Vairochana, as taught in the second section of the root Tantra called the Arising of the Perfection of Wisdom, from the extensive commentary on the Shriparamādya Tantra.

original: // / de ltar sems can rang bzhin bzang ba rnams kyi don du rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar sems can rang bzhin bzang ba rnams kyi don du rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the maṇḍala of Vairocana for the sake of those sentient beings who are naturally good,

original: da ni khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: da ni khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni /
translated: now, in order to abandon anger through anger, he teaches the maṇḍala of Vajra-fierce-fire.

original: de nas sna tshogs las chen po //
analyzed: de nas sna tshogs las chen po //
translated: The great variety of great actions

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” is immediately after.

original: dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: It is immediately after the samādhi of the first union.

original: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa nyid yin ni ;🔽/ sna tshogs ni rnam pa tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa nyid yin ni ; / sna tshogs ni rnam pa tha dad pa ste /
translated: Here, the samādhi of the first union is explained in the maṇḍala of Śrī Vajrasattva.

original: rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The “great variety” is the different kinds of actions, such as the nature of pleasing.

original: 'di la phrin las chen po mnga' bas na sna tshogs las chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di la phrin las chen po mnga' bas na sna tshogs las chen po'o //
translated: He is the great variety of great actions because he possesses great actions.

original: khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po //
analyzed: khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po //
translated: The great lord, the great vajra holder,

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du khyab par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du khyab par mdzad pa'o //
translated: This is the one who has pervaded everything.

original: gdug @288b pa thams cad ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ste de rnams 'dul ba'i mchog ni 'dul bar mdzad pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gdug @288b pa thams cad ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ste de rnams 'dul ba'i mchog ni 'dul bar mdzad pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: All the wicked are Maheśvara, etc. , and the best of those to be subdued is the one who does the subduing, this is the meaning of the expression, the best of those to be subdued.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad //
analyzed: sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad //
translated: he is the one who teaches all sentient beings.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can thams cad de /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can thams cad de /
translated: Since they are sentient beings and all of them, they are all sentient beings.

original: tshar gcad par 'os pa dang / phan gdags par 'os pa rnams so //
analyzed: tshar gcad par 'os pa dang / phan gdags par 'os pa rnams so //
translated: Those who are to be subdued and those who are to be helped.

original: de rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad pa ni rang gi bka' la nges par sbyor bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad pa ni rang gi bka' la nges par sbyor bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: He teaches them, he causes them to be definitely engaged in his word.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
translated: By the meditative concentration of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pa //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pa //
translated: he generates the family of the Tathāgatas.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can rang bzhin bzang ba rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas sems can gyi khams rang bzhin bzang ba rnams 'dul ba'i de bzhin gshegs
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can rang bzhin bzang ba rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas sems can gyi khams rang bzhin bzang ba rnams 'dul ba'i de bzhin gshegs
translated: This is to say, by the samadhi of the Tathagata just explained, in order to tame those sentient beings who are of good nature, having generated the mandala of Vairocana, the Tathagata's samadhi of peace which tames those sentient beings who are of good nature,

original: pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba des dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can kun gyi don bya zhing /
analyzed: pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba des dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can kun gyi don bya zhing /
translated: with that, the purpose of all sentient beings who are fierce and cruel, such as Mahesvara, is to be accomplished.

original: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum 'dul bar rab tu bsgrub par mi nus so zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum 'dul bar rab tu bsgrub par mi nus so zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is not possible to accomplish the taming of the three worlds, such as Mahesvara, and so on.

original: 'jig rten gsum po de gdul bar bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi bar nus par ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po de gdul bar bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi bar nus par ma gyur pa'o //
translated: The three worlds are not able to be tamed by the Tathagata's samadhi of peace.

original: ci'i phyir nus par ma gyur ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir nus par ma gyur ce na /
translated: Why is it not possible?

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, because... and so on.

original: gang gi phyir zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes byas rnams kyis gdug cing ma rungs par gyur pa rang gi ste /🔽rang nyid kyis rang gi sems kyi spyod pa rang bzhin des 'gro ba 'di dag kun rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhi ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes byas rnams kyis gdug cing ma rungs par gyur pa rang gi ste / rang nyid kyis rang gi sems kyi spyod pa rang bzhin des 'gro ba 'di dag kun rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhi ba ste /
translated: Why? Because of their faults, such as anger, they are wild and untamed.🔽All these beings, with their naturally wild and untamed minds, are not to be established in peace,

original: zhi ba'i nyams kyis bzhugs pas rab tu bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba'i nyams kyis bzhugs pas rab tu bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: in the experience of peace, by all the buddhas, Vairochana and so forth.

original: gdug cing gtum pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdug cing gtum pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they have a wild and untamed nature.

original: de bas na bde bar gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na bde bar gshegs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the Sugatas,🔽the Tathagatas, who are engaged in benefiting sentient beings, when they are not engaged in benefiting wild and untamed sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis don mdzad par gyur pa dag gang gi tshe ste dus gang gi tshe gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad par spyod par ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis don mdzad par gyur pa dag gang gi tshe ste dus gang gi tshe gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad par spyod par ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: at that time,

original: nyid kyi dngos po kun zhes bya ba nyid kyi rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos @289a * //
analyzed: nyid kyi dngos po kun zhes bya ba nyid kyi rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos @289a * //
translated: All of his own entities means all of his own entities that have the characteristic of the bodhicitta.

original: po kun zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' ste de la gsol ba btab pa ni gsol ba btab par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: po kun zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' ste de la gsol ba btab pa ni gsol ba btab par gyur pa ste /
translated: Vajrasattva means vajra being, and supplicating him is having supplicated.

original: gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Having supplicated, Please become of the nature of the vajra family in order to subdue the wicked and violent sentient beings.

original: tshig ji lta bus she na /
analyzed: tshig ji lta bus she na /
translated: With what kind of words?

original: sems can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says sentient beings, and so on.

original: de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, merely by the utterance of this mantra means

original: au tishtha sa ma ya kro dha ni sum bha dzva la badzra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: au tishtha sa ma ya kro dha ni sum bha dzva la badzra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis so //
translated: by the utterance of the mantra Uttistha, samayakrodha, sum-bhaj-jvalavajra hūṃ, by all the tathāgatas.

original: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajrapāṇi is Vajrasattva.

original: rang nyid gtso bo ni rang dbang can no //
analyzed: rang nyid gtso bo ni rang dbang can no //
translated: Self-lord means self-master.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From the vajra of body, speech, and mind,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de rnams la slar 'byung zhing phyir 'thon te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de rnams la slar 'byung zhing phyir 'thon te /
translated: Having entered into the vajra of body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas, those vajras of body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas emerge again, come forth,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdun na gnas zhes bya ba la spyan sngar bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdun na gnas zhes bya ba la spyan sngar bzhugs pa'o //
translated: and stand in front of all the Tathagatas.

original: sku gang gis skyil mo krung du ni gang gis she na /
analyzed: sku gang gis skyil mo krung du ni gang gis she na /
translated: In what body? In what posture?

original: khro bo chen po rgyal po'i sku yis ni //🔽sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs //
analyzed: khro bo chen po rgyal po'i sku yis ni // sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs //
translated: In the body of the great angry king,

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he sits well in the bodhisattva posture.

original: khro bo chen po ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo chen po ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
translated: The great angry one is Vajra-flame.

original: de ni rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis ni mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis ni mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the king because he is beautiful and blazing, being the lord of the vajra clan.

original: de'i sku ni gzi mdangs ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sku ni gzi mdangs ldan pa ste /
translated: His body is radiant.

original: khro bo chen po rgyal po'i sku des sgeg pa'i sku'i mdangs gsal te /
analyzed: khro bo chen po rgyal po'i sku des sgeg pa'i sku'i mdangs gsal te /
translated: The body of the great angry king is radiant with the luster of a beautiful body.

original: khro bo'i gzhi mdangs kyis bzhugs so zhes pa'i tha tshig go /
analyzed: khro bo'i gzhi mdangs kyis bzhugs so zhes pa'i tha tshig go /
translated: It is the meaning of the statement that he abides with the luster of anger.

original: sems dpa'i skyil krung ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil krung ni bshad zin to //
translated: The bodhisattva cross-legged posture has been explained.

original: 'bar ba nyid phreng ba dkrigs pas ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba ste de nyid 'od yin la des gsal zhing snang ba 'di la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba nyid phreng ba dkrigs pas ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba ste de nyid 'od yin la des gsal zhing snang ba 'di la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: A garland of flames is a series of flames. Since he is radiant with that light, he is so-called.

original: de ji lta bus snang bar byed ce na /
analyzed: de ji lta bus snang bar byed ce na /
translated: In what way does he shine?

original: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba'am /🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba'am / zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He is like another burning kalpa.🔽He is like another burning kalpa.

original: rdo rje mchog bsdams pa rnam par sreg pa'i bskal pa gnyis 'dra ba'i dang po'i rdo rje gsor zhing snying po gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog bsdams pa rnam par sreg pa'i bskal pa gnyis 'dra ba'i dang po'i rdo rje gsor zhing snying po gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: He is like the first vajra-holder, who waved the vajra and spoke the essence.

original: gzhan yang de nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang de nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, in order to teach his special qualities,

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he is the haughty vajra of the left.

original: @289b g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i dril bu dang bcas pa dkur 'jog par mdzad pa ni g-yon bsnyems pa'o //
analyzed: @289b g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i dril bu dang bcas pa dkur 'jog par mdzad pa ni g-yon bsnyems pa'o //
translated: The left fist is the vajra fist, and the left shoulder is the wrathful bell.

original: des shugs dang bcas pas na drag po ste /
analyzed: des shugs dang bcas pas na drag po ste /
translated: The left is haughty because it is powerful.

original: des gsor ba ni phyag g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje gyen du 'phen pa'o //
analyzed: des gsor ba ni phyag g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje gyen du 'phen pa'o //
translated: The right hand is the first vajra, which is thrown upward.

original: khyad par ji lta bus des gsor zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bus des gsor zhe na /
translated: What is the special quality by which it is thrown?

original: bskyod ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bskyod ces bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said to be moved.

original: myur zhing shin tu rings par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: myur zhing shin tu rings par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is quickly and very rapidly moved.

original: 'bar ba ni rdo rje cher 'bar zhes bya ba 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni cher 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba ni rdo rje cher 'bar zhes bya ba 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni cher 'bar ba'o //
translated: The blazing is the great blazing vajra. The blazing and burning vajra is the great blazing.

original: de'i 'bar bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pas na 'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bar bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pas na 'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba'o //
translated: The blazing of that pervades the entire realm of space, and so it is the great blazing vajra.

original: de'i me stag rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me'i me stag chung du rnams te des sreg pa 'dra zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa thams cad sreg pa'o //
analyzed: de'i me stag rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me'i me stag chung du rnams te des sreg pa 'dra zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa thams cad sreg pa'o //
translated: The sparks of that are the small sparks of the vajra fire. The burning is like burning all of the three realms.

original: gsor ba ni gyen du 'phen pa'o //
analyzed: gsor ba ni gyen du 'phen pa'o //
translated: Throwing means throwing upward.

original: 'bar ba chen po ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba chen po ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu 'bar ba'o //
translated: Great blazing means blazing with the blazing vajras that pervade the entire realm of space.

original: de ji lta bus she na /🔽bskal ba'i me dpung lta bu yin //
analyzed: de ji lta bus she na / bskal ba'i me dpung lta bu yin //
translated: How is that?

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Like the conflagration at the end of the eon.

original: gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: dang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The first vajra is stated.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas pa rdo rje gang yin pa de ni dang po'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas pa rdo rje gang yin pa de ni dang po'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra that abides in the hand of Bhagavān Vajrasattva is the first vajra.

original: khro gnyer bcas zhes bya ba ni khor gnyer bcas par gnas pas bcas so //
analyzed: khro gnyer bcas zhes bya ba ni khor gnyer bcas par gnas pas bcas so //
translated: With frowns means with frowns present.

original: rdo rje mchog 'dzin ni rdo rje dam pa snang ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje mchog 'dzin ni rdo rje dam pa snang ba ste /
translated: Vajra-holder of the supreme is the light of the excellent vajra.

original: dang po'i rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The first vajra-binding is the meaning of the words.

original: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: Spoken means spoken.

original: ci zhig gsungs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig gsungs she na /
translated: What was spoken?

original: de la 'di ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, then and so forth is stated.

original: h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa'o //
translated: The essence is the syllable hūṃ.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba chen po 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'bar pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba chen po 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'bar pa chen po'o //
translated: Since he has mastery over this great blazing vajra, he is the great blazing vajra.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba chen po yang yin la me ltar 'bar ba yang yin zhing de lta bus ni nyi ma dang ldan pas na 'di la rdo rje me 'bar ba chen po mo dang nyi ma zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba chen po yang yin la me ltar 'bar ba yang yin zhing de lta bus ni nyi ma dang ldan pas na 'di la rdo rje me 'bar ba chen po mo dang nyi ma zhes bya ste /
translated: Since he is the great blazing vajra, and since he is blazing like fire, and since he is endowed with the sun, he is called the great blazing vajra-fire-sun.

original: rdo rje me 'byung ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
analyzed: rdo rje me 'byung ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
translated: Vajra-fire is Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: de'i nges pa'i ye shes ni snying po'o //
analyzed: de'i nges pa'i ye shes ni snying po'o //
translated: His definitive pristine consciousness is the essence.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra h'um zhes bya ba la yang nye bar btags pas me'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra h'um zhes bya ba la yang nye bar btags pas me'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The sound that teaches that is called hūṃ, and it is also called the essence of fire.

original: snying po zhes 'di skad ston pa yin te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams @290a * //
analyzed: snying po zhes 'di skad ston pa yin te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams @290a * //
translated: The essence is taught as follows.

original: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs la /
analyzed: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs la /
translated: The Blessed One, Vajrasattva, is requested by the words of supplication of all the tathāgatas to enter the vajra body, speech, and mind of all the tathāgatas.

original: de nas der gnas nas de rnams las rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i skur slar byung ste /
analyzed: de nas der gnas nas de rnams las rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i skur slar byung ste /
translated: Then, abiding there, he again emerged from them in the form of Vajra-Blaze-like-Fire,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zhugs so //
translated: and entered into the presence of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nas gdug cing gtum pa rnams ni nges par rdo rje rigs kyis 'dul ba yin no snyam du dgongs nas shin tu dgyes pas ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis h'um zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas gdug cing gtum pa rnams ni nges par rdo rje rigs kyis 'dul ba yin no snyam du dgongs nas shin tu dgyes pas ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis h'um zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Then, thinking that the wicked and violent are definitely to be subdued by the Vajra Family, he, with great delight, uttered the syllable HUM in the manner previously explained.

original: sdig pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas sdig pa kun te /
analyzed: sdig pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas sdig pa kun te /
translated: Since they are all sins, they are all sins,

original: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi tshul lo //🔽de nyid ni bud shing dang dra bar ye shes kyi mes bsreg par byas pa yin pas na sdig pa kun gyi bud shing ngo //🔽de rnams zad pa ni zad pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi tshul lo // de nyid ni bud shing dang dra bar ye shes kyi mes bsreg par byas pa yin pas na sdig pa kun gyi bud shing ngo // de rnams zad pa ni zad pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: that is, the ways of the ten unwholesome courses of action.🔽 Since they are burned by the fire of wisdom, they are the fuel of all sins.

original: ye shes kyi me'i rang bzhin can gyi yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi me'i rang bzhin can gyi yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The cause of their exhaustion is the syllable HUM, which has the nature of the fire of wisdom.

original: sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad pa'i snying po phyung ba la g-yos pa ni g-yos par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad pa'i snying po phyung ba la g-yos pa ni g-yos par gyur pa'o //
translated: The essence of the fuel of all sins is extracted, and the churning is the churning that occurs.

original: 'gul ba ni 'gul bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'gul ba ni 'gul bar gyur pa ste /
translated: The shaking is the shaking that occurs.

original: phyogs bcu kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can gyi 'jig rten gsum po sa 'og dang sa steng dang / mtho ris kyi mtshan can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g-yos shing 'gul bar bskyod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can gyi 'jig rten gsum po sa 'og dang sa steng dang / mtho ris kyi mtshan can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g-yos shing 'gul bar bskyod par gyur pa'o //
translated: The entire triple world, which is defiled by the ten directions, and which has the nature of a Buddha, and all the world systems, which have the characteristics of the underworld, the earth, and heaven, are shaken and moved.

original: lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni //
analyzed: lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni //
translated: The gods, such as Maheśvara,

original: g-yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur //
analyzed: g-yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur //
translated: are motionless and confused.

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yos par byas nas lha chen po la sogs pa yang brgyal zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yos par byas nas lha chen po la sogs pa yang brgyal zhing /
translated: This is because, by that syllable hūṃ, the entire world system is shaken, and the gods, such as Maheśvara, faint and

translated: Through anger, one is destroyed by the great lord.🔽

analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs pa bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o // me tog dor la rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: One should enter with the rite of entering the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva, and descend upon oneself.

original: khros par gyur pas khro gnyer bsdus pa dang / 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bdud cing phyag bya'o //
analyzed: khros par gyur pas khro gnyer bsdus pa dang / 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bdud cing phyag bya'o //
translated: Having cast the flower, one should make a gesture of throwing a vajra, and with a wrathful frown, and with a smile, one should bow to the Blessed One.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
translated: Then, etc. is understood.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches //
translated: With the great blazing vajra hook,

original: yang dag par ni dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par ni dgug par bya'o //
translated: one should summon

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bkod la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bkod la /
translated: means that one should arrange the assembly of the maṇḍala, up to the vajra descent, in accordance with reality.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo legs par phye ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo legs par phye ste /
translated: Having well opened the door of the maṇḍala,

original: bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba 'khor @294a * //
analyzed: bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba 'khor @294a * //
translated: Having made the collection, having perfectly praised the Bhagavān with the one hundred and eight names, having invited the Bhagavān Vajra-flame with the great vajra-flame hook mantra, one should make offerings to the Bhagavān with the vajra-flame hook mantra.🔽

original: dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs shing dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs shing dgug par bya'o //
translated: Having made the collection, having praised the Blessed One with the one hundred and eight names, one should invite the Blessed One, the blazing vajra, with the great hook mantra, and should summon the Blessed One, the blazing vajra, together with the retinue, into the maṇḍala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
translated: Then, after that, etc. is self-evident.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyang de kho na nyid kyi snying pos gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni hi zhes bya bas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan pas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyang de kho na nyid kyi snying pos gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni hi zhes bya bas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan pas so //
translated: The Blessed One should also be placed with the essence of reality, by the syllable hi, which indicates the essence of reality.

original: 'di skad ston pa /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: yin te / ham zhes bya bzlos shing bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: yin te / ham zhes bya bzlos shing bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting the syllable hi, one should request the Blessed One to remain in the maṇḍala of the blazing vajra.

original: de nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar slob ma la bstan pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar slob ma la bstan pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
translated: Then, one should recite the commitments, immediately after the disciple has been shown in that way.

original: de sems can mang la bde phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de sems can mang la bde phyir dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of the happiness of many sentient beings, and so forth.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bcug nas rdo rje h'um mdzad
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bcug nas rdo rje h'um mdzad
translated: Then, the Blessed One should join the index fingers of the Vajra Humkara Mudra, meaning that having thus drawn the mandala, one should invite the Blessed One together with the retinue according to the previously explained ritual, and having caused them to enter, one should make the index fingers of the Vajra Humkara Mudra touch.

original: yi ge h'um dang bcas pas sdigs mdzub bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um dang bcas pas sdigs mdzub bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in making the threatening gesture together with the syllable Hum.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sdigs mdzub kyi phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sdigs mdzub kyi phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Then, and so forth, explains the benefits of the threatening gesture.

original: de nas cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, one should perform the extensive ritual as it is.

original: de ltar slob ma zhugs par byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar slob ma zhugs par byas nas /
translated: Having thus caused the disciple to enter,

original: de la dbab pa dang / de nas me tog dor du gzhug go //
analyzed: de la dbab pa dang / de nas me tog dor du gzhug go //
translated: one should cause the descent of the wisdom-being, and then have him cast the flower.

original: de nas de blangs la mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de blangs la mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken it, one should tie it on his head.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa la snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa la snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya ste /
translated: Then, in order to show the mandala, the master should release the mudra of placing at the heart.

original: 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the words “one should perform the extensive rite just as it is.”

original: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa'i cho gas slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub ni rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / rdo rje rigs bdag po'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa'i cho gas slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub ni rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / rdo rje rigs bdag po'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang /
translated: “One should perform the consecration, etc., just as it is” means that one should consecrate the disciples with the rite explained in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva, and the spiritual powers are the vajra conduct, the teaching of the reality of the lord of the vajra family,

original: dam tshig gsum sbyin pa dang lung bstan pa dang snying po sbyin pa dang phyag rgya bslab pa dang / mchod pa dang / gzengs bstod pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bshad pa dang / dam tshig bstan pa rnams bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum sbyin pa dang lung bstan pa dang snying po sbyin pa dang phyag rgya bslab pa dang / mchod pa dang / gzengs bstod pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bshad pa dang / dam tshig bstan pa rnams bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the bestowal of the three sacred commitments, the prophecy, the bestowal of the essence, the training in the mudra, the explanation of the result of the worship, praise, etc., and the teaching of the sacred commitments.

original: rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
translated: Vajra wrath is Vajra Flame.

original: de'i las kyi dbye ba bzhi po gang yin @294b bde de rnams la bslab par bya zhing bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i las kyi dbye ba bzhi po gang yin @294b bde de rnams la bslab par bya zhing bstan par bya'o //
translated: One should train in and teach those four kinds of activities.

original: de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: rgyas gdab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te de la rgyas gdab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po la rdo rje mda' bskyed pa'o //🔽phyag rgya gzhig pa ni gdon gyis zin pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyi phyag rgya gzhig pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas gdab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te de la rgyas gdab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po la rdo rje mda' bskyed pa'o // phyag rgya gzhig pa ni gdon gyis zin pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyi phyag rgya gzhig pa'o //
translated: The root text declares, “sealing, etc.” Sealing is the generation of the vajra arrow in the heart of the one to be sealed.🔽Destroying a seal is the destruction of the seal of a spirit that is present in the continuum of one who is possessed by a spirit.

original: 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis bzung ba'i rgyud la yod pa'i gdon gsad pa ni gsad pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis bzung ba'i rgyud la yod pa'i gdon gsad pa ni gsad pa'o //
translated: Killing is the killing of a spirit that is present in the continuum of one who is possessed by a spirit with the seal of holding a wheel.

original: ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis zin pa'i sems can rnams la yang srog 'byin pa ni sems can rnams la slar 'tsho bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis zin pa'i sems can rnams la yang srog 'byin pa ni sems can rnams la slar 'tsho bar bya ba'o //
translated: Reviving is the reviving of living beings who are possessed by spirits with the seal of holding a multicolored banner.

original: rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi po 'di dag gdon gyis bzung ba la bya ba yin nam 'on te ma yin pa ji ltar shes par bya zhe na //🔽gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /🔽sems can gang la mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya sbyar ba na 'gyur bskyed par byed na /
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi po 'di dag gdon gyis bzung ba la bya ba yin nam 'on te ma yin pa ji ltar shes par bya zhe na // gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te / sems can gang la mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya sbyar ba na 'gyur bskyed par byed na /
translated: One may say: How does one know whether these four activities of the vajra wrath are to be performed on someone possessed by an evil spirit or not?

original: sems can de ni gdon gdug pas zin pa yin par shes par bya'o //🔽de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs ba dan 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas sems can de 'tsho bar byas la /
analyzed: sems can de ni gdon gdug pas zin pa yin par shes par bya'o // de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs ba dan 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas sems can de 'tsho bar byas la /
translated: It is said: If, when one applies the mudra of the arrow-holder, etc., to a sentient being, one causes a change to occur, one should know that this sentient being is possessed by an evil spirit.

original: shin tu bsrung ba'i phyag rgyas slar yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing sems can de la gdon gyis 'gyur ba yang byed par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de la bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu bsrung ba'i phyag rgyas slar yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing sems can de la gdon gyis 'gyur ba yang byed par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de la bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having made that sentient being live by means of the mudra of the various life-givers, the banner-holder, one should protect him by means of the mudra of the very protection so that he will not be harmed again and so that the evil spirit will not cause a change to occur in that sentient being.

original: 'tsho ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa 'dis srog byin te bsrung bar bya ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bya'o //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa 'dis srog byin te bsrung bar bya ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bya'o //
translated: One should do that for as long as one lives, by which life is given and protected by this seal of life.

original: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do//
analyzed: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do//
translated: Beginning from then, and so on, is self-evident.

original: de nas 'dir bsgrub pa bshad bya ste zhes bya ba ni de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de nas 'dir bsgrub pa bshad bya ste zhes bya ba ni de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas skabs so //
translated: Now, the accomplishment here is to be explained. The word then refers to the occasion.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
translated: Here refers to the Vajra family.

original: sgrub pa ni bsgrub pa'i thabs las so //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni bsgrub pa'i thabs las so //
translated: Accomplishment is from the means of accomplishment.

original: bshad ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: It is to be explained means it is to be taught.

original: ji bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du //
analyzed: ji bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du //
translated: The body just as it is is the Saṅgha.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs dge zhing sdig pa dang bral ba de'i mdun du ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs dge zhing sdig pa dang bral ba de'i mdun du ste /
translated: In front of that virtuous, sinless image of the Blessed One, blazing like fire, endowed with the characteristics as explained, and so on,

original: spyan sngar rdo rje gsor bas rdo rje gsor zhing dang po zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i @295a * //
analyzed: spyan sngar rdo rje gsor bas rdo rje gsor zhing dang po zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i @295a * //
translated: In front of the eyes, by brandishing the vajra, brandishing the vajra is accomplished.

original: zhag nas brtsams te bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o zhes bya ba bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //🔽de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: zhag nas brtsams te bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o zhes bya ba bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o // de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Beginning from the first day, one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times, one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times.

original: 'bum tshang nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bum tshang nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no //
translated: What happens then? When the hundred thousand is completed, and so on, states its result.

original: de ltar yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, having stated the accomplishment of the syllable hūṃ,

original: da ni de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni sogs pas yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni sogs pas yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: now, then, the accomplishment of the essence of reality and so on states the accomplishment of the syllable hūṃ.

original: 'di yang go sla'o //
analyzed: 'di yang go sla'o //
translated: This is also easy to understand.

original: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, having stated the essence and close essence that have the nature of the dharma-seal,

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: now, then, and so on states the accomplishment of the great seal and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin no //
translated: The word then is as before.

original: phyag rgya rnams kyi dam pa bsgrub pa ni dam tshig sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya rnams kyi dam pa bsgrub pa ni dam tshig sgrub pa ste /
translated: The supreme practice of the seals is the practice of the commitments.

original: phyag rgya chen po thams cad mngon du byas pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po thams cad mngon du byas pa'i thabs so //
translated: It is the means of actualizing all great seals.

original: de nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: That is taught:

original: ji bzhin rab tu phyag rgya bcing //
analyzed: ji bzhin rab tu phyag rgya bcing //
translated: The seal is properly bound.

original: zhes bya ba yin te mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i skabs ni ji bzhin dus te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin te mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i skabs ni ji bzhin dus te /
translated: The time of abiding in the yoga of equipoise is the proper time.

original: de'i dus su phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: de'i dus su phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: At that time, one should bind the great seal and🔽one should generate the thought “I will burn myself,” that is, “I will reduce myself to ashes.”

original: bdag nyid bsreg bar bya'o zhes bya ba rang nyid thal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sems bskyed la bzlas brjod kyi dong yis rang gi lha'i snying po zlos shing srid pa 'di nyid du zhes bya ba tshe 'di nyid la khro bo che zhes bya ba rdo rje
analyzed: bdag nyid bsreg bar bya'o zhes bya ba rang nyid thal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sems bskyed la bzlas brjod kyi dong yis rang gi lha'i snying po zlos shing srid pa 'di nyid du zhes bya ba tshe 'di nyid la khro bo che zhes bya ba rdo rje
translated: Reciting the essence mantra of one’s deity, one should meditate on the great seal of the practitioner of Vajra-Bhairava, “the great wrathful one,” in this very existence, that is, in this very life.

original: me ltar 'bar ba'i sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya chen po sgom par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me ltar 'bar ba'i sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya chen po sgom par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the accomplishments of the great seal will be achieved.

original: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa gsungs nas da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa gsungs nas da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, having explained the achievement of the great seal of all the vajra clans, now, beginning with “then” and so forth, he explains the achievement of the pledge seal of all the vajra clans.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The achievement of the pledge seal is the pledge seal of all the vajra clans, which holds the pledge of the vajra blazing like fire.

original: de'i sgrub pa ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa ni de bzhin no //
translated: The achievement of that is just like that.🔽That is taught: “I will make all invisible,” and so forth.

original: de nyid bstan pa ni bdag ni thams cad mi snang bar bya zhes brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ni bdag ni thams cad mi snang bar bya zhes brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Vajrapāṇi” means

original: bdag ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: bdag ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: “I am the nature of the entire realm of reality,

original: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the essence of the sixteen emptinesses.”

original: gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i rang @295b bzhin thams cad mi snang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i rang @295b bzhin thams cad mi snang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Kill! means make all the natures of Vajradhara and so forth disappear.

original: chos bdag med par bsgom pas bsgom pa'i dus kyi dang por de skad brjod la phyag na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: chos bdag med par bsgom pas bsgom pa'i dus kyi dang por de skad brjod la phyag na rdo rje ste /
translated: By meditating on the selflessness of phenomena, at the beginning of the meditation session one should say Thus! and Vajrapani

original: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: binds the pledge seal of the Vajra Blazing Like Fire,

original: bzlas brjod byas na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bzlas brjod byas na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: and if one does the repetition, the vajra holder yogi will be accomplished.

original: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar 'gyur //
translated: One becomes like the blazing vajra.

original: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the accomplishment of the pledge seal,🔽now, in order to explain the accomplishment of the action seal, he says,

original: da ni de las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni de las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the accomplishment of the action seal.

original: sgrub pa de'i rang gi tshul gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub pa de'i rang gi tshul gsungs pa ni /
translated: He states the nature of that accomplishment:

original: rnam pa bzhi po la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa chen po dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi po la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa chen po dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
translated: The four types are the four activities explained in the section of the Triumph over the Three Realms in the Compendium of Principles, namely, the great worship, consecration,🔽and the characteristics of the Dharma and action worship.

original: chos dang las kyi mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las bzhi po gang yin pa de ni shin tu byed ces bya ba ni rab tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos dang las kyi mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las bzhi po gang yin pa de ni shin tu byed ces bya ba ni rab tu byed pa'o //
translated: The one who does those four activities is “the one who does the activities very well,” that is, the one who does them well.🔽“

original: nyid ces bya ba nges par gzung ste /
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba nges par gzung ste /
translated: The one” is a specification.

original: de nyid bsgrub pa'i mchog gi las byed pas rdo rje las nyid thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid bsgrub pa'i mchog gi las byed pas rdo rje las nyid thob pa yin no //
translated: Since he does the activities of the supreme accomplishment of that, he obtains the state of Vajrakarma.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: thams cad bde ba'i phyir zlos na //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad bde ba'i phyir zlos na // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Reciting for the sake of the happiness of all.

original: sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rigs rtogs pa'i bar du bskyed pa ni thams cad bde ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rigs rtogs pa'i bar du bskyed pa ni thams cad bde ba'o //
translated: All sentient beings are happy when they generate the realization of the Vajra Family.

original: de'i don du bzlas na rdo rje'i las nyid de rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i don du bzlas na rdo rje'i las nyid de rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: If one repeats it for that purpose, it is the vajra activity itself, the activity seal of the vajra blazing like fire.

original: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: The attainment of that is the acquisition.

original: bskal ba chen po ni chos dang las dang / dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bskal ba chen po ni chos dang las dang / dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'o //
translated: A great eon is the accomplishment of the Dharma, the activity, the pledge, and the great seal.

original: de nyid cho ga ste /
analyzed: de nyid cho ga ste /
translated: That itself is the rite.

original: de'i rgyas pa ni de'i rgyun no //
analyzed: de'i rgyas pa ni de'i rgyun no //
translated: Its expansion is its continuity.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
translated: The collection of words that teach that is the tantra.

original: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: This should be understood to teach this meaning:

original: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
translated: Having formed the vajra palms and the vajra binding, one should open the vajra binding at the heart.

original: de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed la /
translated: Then one should generate the vajra descent,

original: dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
translated: and one should open the descent seal at one's heart.

original: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should bind the pledge seal of the vajra fist.

original: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbab pa la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbab pa la /
translated: Then, at the vajra descent located in one's heart,🔽one should visualize the form of one's deity.

original: yi ge h'um yid kyis bris la /
analyzed: yi ge h'um yid kyis bris la /
translated: Having written the syllable hūṃ with the mind,

original: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should recite it with the mind and meditate on all phenomena as selfless.

original: de nas @296a * //
analyzed: de nas @296a * //
translated: Then,

original: yi ge h'um dang yi ge aa'i ye shes dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa la /
analyzed: yi ge h'um dang yi ge aa'i ye shes dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa la /
translated: the syllable hūṃ and the syllable āḥ, together with the sixteen vowels of the gnosis syllables,

original: rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine one’s mind in the form of a moon disc.

original: de'i steng du yi ge h'um nyid dang ka la sogs pa gsal bya'i yi ge dang bcas pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge h'um nyid dang ka la sogs pa gsal bya'i yi ge dang bcas pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: Upon that, the syllable hūṃ itself, together with the syllables ka and so forth, the illuminating syllables, is a moon disc.🔽A second one arises from that, together with the hūṃ, a blazing vajra. In the center of that, one should imagine the syllable hūṃ.

original: gnyis pa yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo rje 'bar ba de'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams la gnyis su med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ltar rdo rje de bzhin no zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal bsgoms la /
analyzed: gnyis pa yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo rje 'bar ba de'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams la gnyis su med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ltar rdo rje de bzhin no zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal bsgoms la /
translated: Meditating on the vajra pride, “The vajra is just like the characteristic of the nondual great mind vajra,”

original: rdo rje de las rdo rje rigs rnams sbrul te /
analyzed: rdo rje de las rdo rje rigs rnams sbrul te /
translated: from that vajra one emanates the vajra family.

original: des gdug pa thams cad btul nas /
analyzed: des gdug pa thams cad btul nas /
translated: Having subdued all the wicked ones with that,

original: de yang rdo rje der yid kyis zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje der yid kyis zhugs par bya'o //
translated: one should mentally cause that to enter into that vajra.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: Then, by the yoga of blessing as Vajrasattva, one should visualize oneself as Vajrasattva.

original: yi ge h'um gis rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bsam mo //🔽de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham /
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bsam mo // de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham /
translated: With the syllable HŪṀ, one should visualize oneself as Vajra-fierce-fire.

original: zhes zlos shing dam tshig chen po'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgom mo //
analyzed: zhes zlos shing dam tshig chen po'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgom mo //
translated: Then, reciting MAHA-SAMAYA-SATVA HŪṀ, one should meditate on oneself as the being of the great commitment.

original: de nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ma h'a sa ma yo& ham /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ma h'a sa ma yo& ham /
translated: Then, binding the pledge seal of Vajra-fierce-fire, one should recite MAHA-SAMAYA HOḤ,

original: zhes zlos shing rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsams la phyag rgya de nyid dang / sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes zlos shing ;
analyzed: zhes zlos shing rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsams la phyag rgya de nyid dang / sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes zlos shing ;
translated: and, visualizing oneself as the body, speech, and mind of Vajra-fierce-fire, one should recite that very seal, SAMAYA SATVA ADHITIṢṬHA SVĀM,

original: snying ga dang dbral ba dang / lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: snying ga dang dbral ba dang / lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: and one should bless the heart, the throat, the forehead, and the crown of the head.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Then, binding the great seal of the Lord,

original: h'um aa: zhes zlos shing sna tshogs padma'i steng du rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um aa: zhes zlos shing sna tshogs padma'i steng du rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Reciting “huṃ aḥ,” one should generate the blazing vajra on a variegated lotus.

original: de nas rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bsams la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bsams la /
translated: Then, having visualized huṃ in the center of the vajra,

original: badzra& ham zhes bsgoms nas /
analyzed: badzra& ham zhes bsgoms nas /
translated: one should meditate on “vajra aṃ.”

original: de nyid badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: de nyid badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: Then, with “vajra jñānavajrānalajvālānalarkā huṃ,” one should visualize oneself as Vajra-Blaze-like-Fire.

original: de nas de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar bar dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de nas de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar bar dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Then, having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled the Blessed One Vajra-Blaze-like-Fire with the vajra hook and so forth, one should form one’s pledge seal,

original: h'um dri shya zhes bya bas blta bar byas la rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po'i h'um gis rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um dri shya zhes bya bas blta bar byas la rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po'i h'um gis rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and having looked with “huṃ dṛśya,” one should cause the Blessed One to enter one’s body with the huṃ of the great blazing vajra hook.

original: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Then, having formed one’s great pledge seal,

original: sa ma ya stvam hi zhes zlos shing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor @296b bskyed la de zhugs pas bcom ldan 'das dang bdag nyid gcig tu gyur nas /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam hi zhes zlos shing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor @296b bskyed la de zhugs pas bcom ldan 'das dang bdag nyid gcig tu gyur nas /
