translated: This is the rite of the burnt offerings of the approach.

original: de ltar mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstod la /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstod la /
translated: In this way, having thoroughly praised the Blessed One together with his retinue with the Praise in One Hundred and Eight Names,

original: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dang / me tog la sogs pas yang @303a * //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dang / me tog la sogs pas yang @303a * //
translated: one should make offerings with the twelve offerings of the mudrā goddesses beginning with Vajra-Wrathful-Weapon, and with flowers, etc.,

original: dag par mchod de slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: dag par mchod de slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
translated: and one should consecrate the disciples.

original: de la re zhig dang por slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //🔽dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa las //
analyzed: de la re zhig dang por slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o // dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa las //
translated: First, the disciple, holding flowers in his hands, should bow to the master and say this:🔽Greatly joyful one, I am your disciple.

original: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
translated: Please consider me, master.🔽I pay homage to the lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //🔽mgon po bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //🔽dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa // mgon po bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo // dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
translated: the teacher of the bodhisattva way.🔽Please grant me the reality of the commitments,

original: sngom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
analyzed: sngom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
translated: and also the vows.

original: de nas slob dpon gyis de rnams kyi snying gar sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas slob dpon gyis de rnams kyi snying gar sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
translated: Then the master should generate a moon mandala in their hearts with the syllable samaya,

original: de h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bsams la lag pa g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'bar ba blangs la de'i snying gar bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bsams la lag pa g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'bar ba blangs la de'i snying gar bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: and imagine that from a hūṃ there is a blazing five-pronged vajra. Taking up the blazing vajra with the wrathful fist of the right hand, he should place it on their hearts and say this:🔽suratas tvam,🔽samayas tvam,

original: su ra ta stvam sa ma ya stvam ham badzra siddha ya tha su kham /
analyzed: su ra ta stvam sa ma ya stvam ham badzra siddha ya tha su kham /
translated: ahaṃ vajrasiddhyā tathāgataḥ.

original: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ste /
translated: Then, having them confess their sins and so forth,

original: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
analyzed: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
translated: gather together your thoughts well

original: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon //🔽brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
analyzed: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon // brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
translated: and listen with a very good motivation.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
translated: The Sugatas will not bless🔽the minds of the forgetful.🔽Whatever nonvirtue I have done under the sway of the afflictions

original: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //🔽de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
analyzed: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang // de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
translated: or rejoiced in,🔽I confess all of that

original: spyan sngar ma lus de ltar so sor bshags //
analyzed: spyan sngar ma lus de ltar so sor bshags //
translated: in the presence of the supreme Bodhi.🔽I rejoice in the two collections of the Sugatas' children

original: bde gshegs sras kyis tshogs gnyis zab pa dang // rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
analyzed: bde gshegs sras kyis tshogs gnyis zab pa dang // rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
translated: and in the profound and vast practice for the sake of all beings🔽without exception,

original: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan pa la'ang //🔽rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan pa la'ang // rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: whether it is done by them or by others.🔽May all beings be filled with the compassion

original: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cig / blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
analyzed: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cig / blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
translated: of the Buddhas, who have minds of compassion,🔽and may they be free from the darkness of ignorance🔽and the stains of evil.

original: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang zhugs pa //
analyzed: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang zhugs pa //
translated: May they all enter the lotus of the family.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the Sugatas.

original: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
analyzed: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
translated: The delightful grove of the supreme minds,

original: dman pas 'jigs dang bral bas rgyal byed tshal //
analyzed: dman pas 'jigs dang bral bas rgyal byed tshal //
translated: The Jetavana, free from the fear of the inferior,🔽The supreme subduer of the bonds of existence,

original: srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the supreme speech, the Dharma.

original: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
translated: Having conquered the poison of snakes such as desire,

original: blo gros rnam rgyas thugs rje cher ldan pa'i//
analyzed: blo gros rnam rgyas thugs rje cher ldan pa'i//
translated: With vast intelligence and great compassion,

original: @303b brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: @303b brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the assembly of excellent spiritual practices.

original: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to those who are free from existence.

original: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
analyzed: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
translated: After the cause, the lord, the object, and the self,

original: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal 'gyur ba //
translated: By the power of the result, one becomes victorious over the enemy.

original: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
analyzed: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
translated: With the root of compassion inserted, one has right understanding.

original: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
translated: One should uphold the incomparable enlightenment.

original: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
translated: Either for the sake of ripening sentient beings,

original: yang na yongs su skyob par bya phyir ram //
analyzed: yang na yongs su skyob par bya phyir ram //
translated: Or for the sake of fully protecting them,

original: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to purify my own mind,

original: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du gtang //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du gtang //
translated: I will give up everything, as if it were grass.🔽Likewise, I will cultivate the unsurpassed🔽discipline, patience, diligence,

original: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
translated: concentration, and wisdom

original: bdag dang gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to benefit myself and others.

original: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bya //
translated: I will cultivate them in every moment.

original: bde bar gshegs pa sngags la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa sngags la mkhas pa yis //
translated: The Sugata, skilled in mantra,

original: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
analyzed: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
translated: the Dharma King, always spontaneously🔽accomplishes the welfare of beings

original: blo sogs rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: blo sogs rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: with his body, speech, and mind.

original: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
analyzed: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
translated: I will abide in the state of excellence🔽in order to attain the same.

original: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
analyzed: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
translated: I will say this three times.

original: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
translated: By the root of merit of saying this, I will give up everything.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: I will generate the thought of sameness toward all sentient beings.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
translated: I will tame all sentient beings with all the various methods and establish them in the realm of nonabiding nirvana.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: Even when all sentient beings have attained nirvana, I will generate the thought, ‘Not a single sentient being has attained nirvana.’

original: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtog par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtog par bgyi'o //
translated: I will contemplate the nonarising of all phenomena.

original: bdag gis ma yengs ba'i sems dang ; thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ma yengs ba'i sems dang ; thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
translated: With an undistracted mind and the mind of omniscient wisdom, I will train in the six perfections.

original: bdag gis thos pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtog par bgyi'o //🔽bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs @304a * //
analyzed: bdag gis thos pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtog par bgyi'o // bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs @304a * //
translated: I will contemplate abiding in a single hearing.

original: par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o //
translated: I will train in order to realize abiding in the thirty-seven factors of awakening.

original: bdag gis stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
translated: I will strive to realize the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
translated: In the same way, I will accomplish all the limitless qualities of the Buddha, without exception.

original: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te /
translated: This is the vajra-like generation of the great thought of enlightenment of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste /
translated: He is the father of all the Tathagatas, the doer of the bidding of all the Tathagatas, the eldest son of all the Tathagatas.

original: 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
translated: He is the Blessed One, Samantabhadra.

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par 'gyur ba rdzogs par byas
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par 'gyur ba rdzogs par byas
translated: By the power of the roots of virtue that are well-performed, I will, abiding in this generation of the mind, complete the conduct called “Samantabhadra,” abiding in infinite doors without limit.

original: nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //
translated: Having done so, I will definitely engage in delighting, delighting, and encouraging all the hosts of beings to be trained by teaching them the many doors of the divisions of conduct.

original: de nas slob ma'i lag tu rdo rje khro bo'i dris dri /🔽me tog gis me tog / rdo rje bdug pas de la bdug spos sbyin zhing /
analyzed: de nas slob ma'i lag tu rdo rje khro bo'i dris dri / me tog gis me tog / rdo rje bdug pas de la bdug spos sbyin zhing /
translated: Then, in the disciple’s hand, one should give the vajra, the incense of wrath,🔽the flower with the flower, and the incense of the vajra incense.

original: rdo rje mar mes mar me snang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mar mes mar me snang bar bya'o //
translated: The vajra lamp should illuminate the lamp.

original: de nas au dumw'a ra dang / aa shva ttha las byas pa'i so shing dris byugs shing me tog bcings pas rdo rje bzhad pa'i khro bo bzlas shing bsrung bar byas pa sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas au dumw'a ra dang / aa shva ttha las byas pa'i so shing dris byugs shing me tog bcings pas rdo rje bzhad pa'i khro bo bzlas shing bsrung bar byas pa sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then, having anointed a tooth stick made of udumbara or aśvattha wood with perfume and tied it with a flower, one should give it to the disciple, having recited the mantra of Vajra Smile and having protected him.

original: ku sha sar pa las rdo rje rnon po'i khro bo bzlas pa sbyin no //
analyzed: ku sha sar pa las rdo rje rnon po'i khro bo bzlas pa sbyin no //

translated: Having thus laid out the lines of the outer maṇḍala, in the center of that, in the center of the maṇḍala, one should drive in a dagger of vajra-wood, such as acacia, having enchanted it one hundred and eight times with the mantra of the dagger explained previously, and repeating “huṃ.”

translated: One should roll up the cord of five-colored thread with that dagger, and having tied it, one should lay out the lines beginning from the northeast direction, circling to the right, with twenty parts, and lay out the lines of the maṇḍala of the blazing vajra in the middle of all.

analyzed: de'i nyis 'gyur gyis ni gnyis pa'o //
